6f75b6d061fcad0023cc46b289485c5c8bfe420a.summary: Nicolas Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, were captured by U.S. forces in Venezuela and brought to New York. Maduro pleaded not guilty in a Manhattan federal court to charges including drug trafficking, weapons offenses, and narco-terrorism. He maintains his innocence and claims he is still president of Venezuela.
6f75b6d061fcad0023cc46b289485c5c8bfe420a.headline: Maduro Pleads Not Guilty to US Drug and Narco Terrorism Charges

24efd2ed604560340e2a6e4403adac9549a43923.summary: Nicolás Maduro, described as Venezuela's leader, was captured by the U.S. and appeared in a New York court, pleading not guilty to drug charges. The event has led to uncertainty in Cuba and reactions across the region, while discussions continue about Maduro's possible successor in Venezuela.
24efd2ed604560340e2a6e4403adac9549a43923.headline: Venezuelan Leader Maduro Captured by U.S. and Pleads Not Guilty in

8a5379991adce9d6a4f11894d7a77f18adb0b834.summary: A Paris court has convicted 10 people of cyberbullying France's first lady, Brigitte Macron, for spreading false online claims about her gender and sexuality. The verdict comes as the Macrons pursue a related legal case in the U.S. against Candace Owens for promoting similar allegations.
8a5379991adce9d6a4f11894d7a77f18adb0b834.headline: Ten Convicted in France for Cyberbullying Brigitte Macron

3d2b9121887f43c5e7031e04d4cae33ca776f9e9.summary: Miami Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa said he is open to a fresh start after being benched for the team's final three games of the 2025 season. Tagovailoa made the statement to reporters on Monday.
3d2b9121887f43c5e7031e04d4cae33ca776f9e9.headline: Tua Tagovailoa Open to Fresh Start After Late Season Bench

cc377a2b5fb584e1a2c1a48ced63acff5340d9fc.summary: The Atlanta Hawks and Trae Young, along with his agent, are working together on a trade. The Washington Wizards have emerged as a serious potential destination for Young, according to multiple reports. Trade discussions involving Young have intensified as the NBA trade deadline approaches.
cc377a2b5fb584e1a2c1a48ced63acff5340d9fc.headline: Atlanta Hawks and Trae Young Exploring Trade

36a1f30f44a202be3abc450caba3ee37e20b743a.summary: The US is holding meetings with oil executives to discuss reviving Venezuela's oil industry after Trump indicated potential subsidies and support for US companies to access Venezuelan reserves. Trump also suggested reimbursing China for its investments and asked Rubio to oversee Venezuela's overhaul following Maduro's arrest. Protests have emerged opposing US intervention.
36a1f30f44a202be3abc450caba3ee37e20b743a.headline: US Considers Subsidies and Support for Oil Operations in Venezuela

c2177c670b2a16c80f98b28f3b688d11d74a974e.summary: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz has ended his campaign for a third term and will not seek reelection, following scrutiny over a state welfare fraud scandal. Walz's decision comes less than four months after launching his reelection bid.
c2177c670b2a16c80f98b28f3b688d11d74a974e.headline: Gov. Tim Walz Withdraws from Reelection Amid Welfare Fraud Scandal

1f9577d2ad92f311b0639981dc9a3a9e7248b3ed.summary: Liam Rosenior has confirmed his departure from Strasbourg and announced he has verbally agreed to become the new head coach of Chelsea, succeeding Enzo Maresca. Rosenior stated he has not yet signed a formal contract but said the opportunity was one he could not refuse.
1f9577d2ad92f311b0639981dc9a3a9e7248b3ed.headline: Liam Rosenior Set to Become Chelsea Head Coach After Verbal Agreement

030ac588b4013db801f10880050b11a7ee28bddd.summary: Delcy Rodríguez has been formally sworn in as Venezuela's interim president following the capture of Nicolás Maduro by the United States. Rodríguez, known for her economic policy work and ties with business leaders, assumes leadership as Venezuela faces political uncertainty.
030ac588b4013db801f10880050b11a7ee28bddd.headline: Delcy Rodríguez Sworn In as Venezuelas Interim President After

d091a0760fcb5bd1205a70093f8864be2af3a65e.summary: Golden State Warriors coach Steve Kerr was ejected in the fourth quarter during the team's 103-102 loss to the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday night. Kawhi Leonard led the Clippers with 24 points, and rookie Kobe Sanders added 20. Warriors player Stephen Curry fouled out for the first time since 2021.
d091a0760fcb5bd1205a70093f8864be2af3a65e.headline: Clippers Edge Warriors 103 102 as Steve Kerr Is Ejected

eb8a13dd58467cf10302b10750d3a5b7576ce255.summary: Eva Schloss, Auschwitz survivor and stepsister of Anne Frank, has died at 96. Schloss was known for her decades of work educating people about the Holocaust and the dangers of prejudice. King Charles III praised her lifelong efforts to combat hatred and promote understanding.
eb8a13dd58467cf10302b10750d3a5b7576ce255.headline: Holocaust Educator Eva Schloss Dies at 96

d21ea645b2c71218a30dabd17f29d8240037c336.summary: The Cleveland Browns have fired Kevin Stefanski after a 5-12 season and consecutive last-place finishes. The team is searching for a new head coach and has not confirmed Shedeur Sanders as their starting quarterback for 2026. Cleveland holds first-round draft picks and faces uncertainty at the quarterback position entering the offseason.
d21ea645b2c71218a30dabd17f29d8240037c336.headline: Browns Fire Kevin Stefanski

782f6c123024453949b10b0104f71a53c54d4da3.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has appointed Chrystia Freeland as an economic development adviser to assist with Ukraine's postwar reconstruction.
782f6c123024453949b10b0104f71a53c54d4da3.headline: Chrystia Freeland Appointed as Economic Adviser to Ukraine

1f46593240e65ee842152df869ae1cd828d521ae.summary: Families of Manchester Arena bombing victims have written to Keir Starmer, urging that MI5 and the Security Service be included in a new law aimed at preventing cover-ups. The law follows previous campaigning by families of the 1989 Hillsborough disaster.
1f46593240e65ee842152df869ae1cd828d521ae.headline: Manchester Arena Families Urge MI5 Inclusion in Anti Cover Up Law

dcdfed0d1daedfd38b79adcee55ea240176d1d48.summary: A court has ruled that the Trump administration cannot cut NIH research funding. Separately, the administration has frozen billions in child care funds for Colorado and four other states.
dcdfed0d1daedfd38b79adcee55ea240176d1d48.headline: Court Blocks NIH Funding Cuts

cef7441fa32343c02b8ecbd1c0dbc47f9890dffd.summary: Australia reached 518-7 at stumps on day three of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney, leading England by 134 runs. Travis Head scored 163 and Steve Smith remained unbeaten on 129, marking his first century of the series. England had posted 384 in their first innings.
cef7441fa32343c02b8ecbd1c0dbc47f9890dffd.headline: Australia Lead England by 134 Runs After Day Three of Fifth Ashes

dfaf1cbbfb9aab22a21dbb6b9d88ff9d70227317.summary: Greenland has dismissed concerns about a possible U.S. takeover after President Trump repeated his interest in annexing the territory. Denmark's prime minister warned that Trump's threats should be taken seriously and urged him to stop making them. The situation follows recent U.S. actions in Venezuela.
dfaf1cbbfb9aab22a21dbb6b9d88ff9d70227317.headline: Greenland Rejects U.S. Takeover Fears as Denmark Urges Trump to Halt

b2679eaa2d20b6c5becbe92674c70427fb3939c8.summary: A plaque created to honor law enforcement for their actions on January 6 has gone missing and is not currently displayed at the Capitol. Its exact location is unknown, but it is believed to be in storage.
b2679eaa2d20b6c5becbe92674c70427fb3939c8.headline: Plaque Honoring Jan. 6 Law Enforcement Missing From Capitol

815b972fb27bb91c1abd8b549b5823b1b2ac80d7.summary: Hyundai Motor Group announced plans to produce 30,000 humanoid robots annually by 2028, with deployment set to begin at a US factory that was involved in a major immigration raid in 2025. The robots are intended for use in car manufacturing.
815b972fb27bb91c1abd8b549b5823b1b2ac80d7.headline: Hyundai to Deploy 30

d90a8513a4af6ea097f2d2b68f66a1c2cdbbb29e.summary: On Black Monday, four NFL head coaches were fired, including Las Vegas Raiders' Pete Carroll, Cleveland Browns' Kevin Stefanski, and Arizona Cardinals' Jonathan Gannon.
d90a8513a4af6ea097f2d2b68f66a1c2cdbbb29e.headline: Four NFL Head Coaches Fired on Black Monday

a77d9a421e9dc207c94e504604fb5cc956d0c8e4.summary: Nicolás Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, pleaded not guilty to drug and weapon charges during a U.S. federal court arraignment. During the 40-minute hearing, Maduro declared himself a 'prisoner of war.'
a77d9a421e9dc207c94e504604fb5cc956d0c8e4.headline: Maduro Pleads Not Guilty in U.S. Court

2bd7daa6bc32927ddd760f260667fa682a90c804.summary: Versant, Comcast's spinoff owning cable networks such as CNBC, USA Network, and MS NOW, began trading on the Nasdaq on Monday. Shares fell 13% on the first day amid ongoing concerns about the cable television sector.
2bd7daa6bc32927ddd760f260667fa682a90c804.headline: Comcast Spinoff Versant Shares Drop 13% in Nasdaq Debut

ac7e4435e84497d80d6cb91f27e39e80d0480b28.summary: The US conducted a raid in Venezuela resulting in the arrest of Maduro. Analysts say this action is unlikely to alter China's approach to Taiwan, though it has raised questions about the effectiveness of Chinese-made weapons in defending allies.
ac7e4435e84497d80d6cb91f27e39e80d0480b28.headline: US Raid in Venezuela Unlikely to Shift Chinas Taiwan Policy

e40b399a6f9e624b62a91bd4bc12d8991d51f84a.summary: The NBA will return to China for the 2026-27 preseason, with the Mavericks and Rockets set to play two games in Macao in October 2026. Cooper Flagg and Amen Thompson will participate in promoting the event.
e40b399a6f9e624b62a91bd4bc12d8991d51f84a.headline: NBA to Hold 2026 Preseason Games in Macao With Mavericks and Rockets

d16a056c1ee4c51578ece5f3816a9c4c7e78eddb.summary: China has imposed export controls on goods to Japan that could have military applications, following remarks by Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi about Taiwan. The move escalates tensions between the two countries.
d16a056c1ee4c51578ece5f3816a9c4c7e78eddb.headline: China Imposes Export Controls on Japan Over Taiwan Comments

ac5957ca7dcf3e16569fc040efe1c5fa415ca907.summary: Federal health officials have revised the U.S. childhood vaccine schedule to resemble Denmark's approach. Some experts have criticized the move, saying it is not supported by scientific evidence.
ac5957ca7dcf3e16569fc040efe1c5fa415ca907.headline: U.S. Updates Childhood Vaccine Schedule to Align With Denmark

22b827ffbeee167bc37b232481d6047bfe8addaa.summary: InPost has received an indicative proposal for the acquisition of the company, according to Bloomberg. The announcement comes as European stocks, including the Stoxx 600, reached record highs on Tuesday.
22b827ffbeee167bc37b232481d6047bfe8addaa.headline: InPost Receives Indicative Acquisition Proposal Amid Stock Market

e19b92dbf2f5cdd577112b01417b7b027f057afe.summary: A Minneapolis Hilton hotel canceled room reservations for immigration agents, according to the Department of Homeland Security. Hilton and the hotel apologized after an email cited by DHS stated that immigration agents were not allowed to stay at the property. Hilton's shares declined following the news.
e19b92dbf2f5cdd577112b01417b7b027f057afe.headline: Minneapolis Hilton Cancels Immigration Agents Reservations

a62003e14ee4d7f53da41ce469fae51f89c83714.summary: The European Commission stated that sexualized AI-generated images produced by the X chatbot Grok are illegal. Britain has requested explanations from those responsible for the chatbot's content.
a62003e14ee4d7f53da41ce469fae51f89c83714.headline: European Commission Calls Groks Sexualized AI Images Illegal

1c3504ed8b6b6fa26a94274f4796ef3eef8978fa.summary: Modella Capital has begun insolvency proceedings for Claire’s and The Original Factory Shop after poor Christmas trading, putting 2,550 jobs at risk. The owner described trading as extremely challenging and said both retailers are in a vulnerable position.
1c3504ed8b6b6fa26a94274f4796ef3eef8978fa.headline: Claires and The Original Factory Shop Enter Insolvency Proceedings

5579cdd1d50539393c911ed0f8f5061cb0e83371.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang announced the launch of the company's new Rubin computing architecture at CES in Las Vegas. Huang stated that the next generation of chips is in full production and will be available later this year, offering five times the artificial intelligence computing performance.
5579cdd1d50539393c911ed0f8f5061cb0e83371.headline: Nvidia Unveils Rubin AI Chip Architecture

2fd3cdce491ced72b14aa7113d48853400a689f1.summary: Rep. Doug LaMalfa of California has died at age 65. His death reduces the Republican majority in the U.S. House of Representatives to 218-213, further narrowing the margin for passing legislation.
2fd3cdce491ced72b14aa7113d48853400a689f1.headline: Rep. Doug LaMalfa Dies at 65

63e3a1bc05f471dea7338ba26ca8d809b73f6a86.summary: President Trump has renewed calls for the US to take control of Greenland after the removal of Venezuela's Nicolás Maduro. Danish officials warn Greenland faces economic challenges, and Denmark's leader says US action could end NATO. European leaders have expressed support for Denmark amid concerns over US intentions. The US has not ruled out military force.
63e3a1bc05f471dea7338ba26ca8d809b73f6a86.headline: Trump Renews Push for US Control of Greenland

b1c7e1ecda8a40be2b33ab622471ac9c8d988d3c.summary: The Dallas Cowboys have fired defensive coordinator Matt Eberflus after one season in which the team allowed an NFL-worst 30.1 points per game and recorded franchise lows in interceptions. Eberflus was previously dismissed by the Chicago Bears during the 2024 season. The Cowboys will now search for their fourth defensive coordinator in four years.
b1c7e1ecda8a40be2b33ab622471ac9c8d988d3c.headline: Cowboys Dismiss Matt Eberflus After One Season as Defensive

09c601c8f75277b0953c98a06c8fa9a20070032c.summary: President Trump told House Republicans that he will be impeached if his party does not win the upcoming midterm elections, emphasizing the importance of securing victories in the November vote for control of Congress.
09c601c8f75277b0953c98a06c8fa9a20070032c.headline: Trump Says Impeachment Likely if Republicans Lose Midterms

d53fd6dfb39927fd1553037901e51f5552ef5b25.summary: Atlanta Hawks point guard Trae Young and his agent are working with the team on a potential trade. The Washington Wizards have emerged as a legitimate trade destination for Young as the NBA trade deadline approaches. Trade discussions involving Young have intensified in recent weeks.
d53fd6dfb39927fd1553037901e51f5552ef5b25.headline: Washington Wizards Emerge as Trade Destination for Trae Young

d54a58300a12d32539dfc088b94e296f8b943e8b.summary: The Washington Commanders and offensive coordinator Kliff Kingsbury have mutually agreed to part ways after the 2025 season, while defensive coordinator Joe Whitt Jr. has been fired. Both coordinators were hired in February 2024 as part of Dan Quinn's staff. The changes follow a disappointing 2025 season.
d54a58300a12d32539dfc088b94e296f8b943e8b.headline: Commanders Part Ways With Kingsbury and Fire Whitt Jr. After 2025

7957b24909f9239f074e712b6cd26a52df02bccc.summary: A New Year's Eve fire at a bar in Crans-Montana killed 40 people and injured 116. Authorities confirmed the bar had not undergone the legally required annual safety inspections. Local officials are now facing criticism over the lack of oversight leading up to the incident.
7957b24909f9239f074e712b6cd26a52df02bccc.headline: Crans Montana Bar Fire Kills 40 Amid Lapses in Safety Inspections

d5275c513d00b1dc77ecddb359e351d433d239a2.summary: The Atlanta Falcons and Kirk Cousins have adjusted the final two years of Cousins' contract, with a decision on his future with the team set for March 13, 2026, the third day of the NFL league year. Cousins' status with the Falcons beyond that date remains uncertain.
d5275c513d00b1dc77ecddb359e351d433d239a2.headline: Falcons to Decide Kirk Cousins Future by March 13

d3c5a3949d32cc62904e8696bd489015c5a92fbe.summary: Ukraine's allies have agreed to provide multilayered, binding security guarantees modeled after NATO commitments, according to a draft summit statement and official announcements. These measures are part of a broader peace proposal for Ukraine.
d3c5a3949d32cc62904e8696bd489015c5a92fbe.headline: Allies Agree on Binding

5d776e9f4a5c40c4bedbd1a1751ae247b3410203.summary: Hilton announced it is removing a Minnesota hotel from its system after the hotel canceled room reservations for DHS and ICE agents. Both Hilton and the hotel have apologized for the incident.
5d776e9f4a5c40c4bedbd1a1751ae247b3410203.headline: Hilton Drops Minnesota Hotel After Canceled DHS and ICE Reservations

bc299e7fdd2aee41f3538a581f62f44bc90e3fdb.summary: UK technology minister Liz Kendall has urged Elon Musk's social media platform X to take immediate action against the spread of nonconsensual intimate 'deepfake' images of women and minors, calling the content 'absolutely appalling.'
bc299e7fdd2aee41f3538a581f62f44bc90e3fdb.headline: UK Presses X to Act on Nonconsensual Deepfake Images

ad1db053cc9fc6e14a07fdefc873eb7b2b3c4681.summary: The LPGA and TMRW Sports announced the launch of WTGL, a women's team golf league featuring LPGA Tour players. WTGL will begin in winter 2026-27 at the SoFi Center in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida, and will use a simulator format similar to the men's TGL league.
ad1db053cc9fc6e14a07fdefc873eb7b2b3c4681.headline: LPGA and TMRW Sports Launch Womens Simulator Golf League for 2026 27

dd98c5c71758b5283ba1b312774cbfc2d56a78dd.summary: Hundreds of schools have closed across England and Wales due to heavy snow and cold temperatures, with further disruption expected as Storm Goretti brings more severe weather. Authorities have issued fresh warnings after days of delays and closures in affected regions.
dd98c5c71758b5283ba1b312774cbfc2d56a78dd.headline: Storm Goretti Forces School Closures Across England and Wales

c948b3e634e109554bc13abd31c404bd925f86e0.summary: Israel has approved the upgrade of 4G mobile services for Palestinians in the West Bank. Separately, casualties were taken to Istishari Arab Hospital in Ramallah after an Israeli army attack on Birzeit University.
c948b3e634e109554bc13abd31c404bd925f86e0.headline: Israel Approves 4G for West Bank

157c9109c5dccbd78186c424502fc5ff01b0ed04.summary: NASA's SPHEREx Observatory has completed mapping the entire sky in 102 infrared colors, with an image released on December 18, 2025. The map highlights emissions from stars, hot hydrogen gas, and cosmic dust. Additionally, scientists used NASA’s IXPE to study the white dwarf star EX Hydrae, providing new insights into its energetic structure.
157c9109c5dccbd78186c424502fc5ff01b0ed04.headline: NASA Releases Full Sky Infrared Map

3e41a535b8596a3e9ae78d07fd93de206ccc24e6.summary: Scottie Barnes of the Toronto Raptors has entered the top 20 in NBA All-Star Voting 2026, according to the second round of fan returns. Luka Dončić and Giannis Antetokounmpo remain the leading vote-getters for their respective conferences.
3e41a535b8596a3e9ae78d07fd93de206ccc24e6.headline: Scottie Barnes Reaches Top 20 in 2026 NBA All Star Voting

a3d36d6d4c07858b3c3c41d5d65dca0739e2c7e0.summary: Industry leaders in Canada express concern that increased Venezuelan oil exports to the U.S. could negatively impact Canadian producers. While some officials downplay the threat, others argue that Canada needs new pipeline capacity to remain competitive.
a3d36d6d4c07858b3c3c41d5d65dca0739e2c7e0.headline: Canadian Oil Sector Faces Pressure From Rising Venezuelan Exports

2edcf5067a32883c3946463fb64a35cdb777f7b3.summary: Saudi Arabia will open its financial market to all foreign investors next month, allowing broader international participation in its stock market to attract more investment inflows.
2edcf5067a32883c3946463fb64a35cdb777f7b3.headline: Saudi Arabia to Open Stock Market to All Foreign Investors Next Month

c48e70c6167bfb2346dc0c53d5eb04dee26f5b08.summary: Meta has delayed the international launch of its $799 Ray-Ban Display smart glasses, originally planned for early 2026 in France, Italy, Canada, and the U.K., due to strong demand in the US and supply constraints.
c48e70c6167bfb2346dc0c53d5eb04dee26f5b08.headline: Meta Delays International Launch of Ray Ban Smart Glasses

def824a64ac48f9b81122ac02eeb175aff0a1f95.summary: Nicolas Maduro and his wife have been indicted in the United States on charges of conspiring to traffic cocaine and enrich themselves. Maduro was recently arraigned in court following his capture.
def824a64ac48f9b81122ac02eeb175aff0a1f95.headline: Nicolas Maduro and Wife Indicted and Arraigned on U.S. Drug Charges

57e5f00a2115b29eb3cb0102a01d920745ca88b7.summary: Nicolás Maduro and his wife pleaded not guilty in New York. Separately, the CDC reduced routine childhood vaccine recommendations following President Trump's directive, using a model from a country with universal health care.
57e5f00a2115b29eb3cb0102a01d920745ca88b7.headline: Maduro Pleads Not Guilty in New York

e346c8802e9890662e863b5b870cbb26ddd32662.summary: The Raiders have the first overall pick in the 2026 NFL draft, followed by the Jets at No. 2 and the Cardinals at No. 3. The top of the draft order is set, but selections beyond the first pick remain uncertain.
e346c8802e9890662e863b5b870cbb26ddd32662.headline: Raiders Secure No. 1 Pick in 2026 NFL Draft

805729d0737181bcbb3498d4bd7e5b2b224437e4.summary: Manchester United director of football Jason Wilcox is considering Ole Gunnar Solskjær as a prime candidate for interim manager following the sacking of Ruben Amorim. Senior players are reportedly open to Solskjær's temporary appointment, as the club reviews potential replacements.
805729d0737181bcbb3498d4bd7e5b2b224437e4.headline: Ole Gunnar Solskjær Considered for Interim Manchester United Manager

67f6e70d6b9d74e1d649f6fd94416841b390c975.summary: NASCAR commissioner Steve Phelps announced his resignation after more than 20 years with the series, following a federal trial that revealed inflammatory texts he sent during revenue-sharing negotiations.
67f6e70d6b9d74e1d649f6fd94416841b390c975.headline: NASCAR Commissioner Steve Phelps Resigns After Federal Trial

7894d0b918bf81fea8786327934dc54d8c1d8b58.summary: The Clippers defeated the Warriors 103-102. Kawhi Leonard scored 24 points and rookie Kobe Sanders added 20 for the Clippers. Warriors coach Steve Kerr was ejected in the fourth quarter, and Stephen Curry fouled out for the first time since 2021.
7894d0b918bf81fea8786327934dc54d8c1d8b58.headline: Clippers Edge Warriors 103 102

1593ffe58d1a6cbcb6bd15b9a5a2141a7178653f.summary: Meta has appointed C.J. Mahoney as chief legal officer, replacing Jennifer Newstead. The leadership change comes as the company faces increased attention to antitrust and data privacy matters.
1593ffe58d1a6cbcb6bd15b9a5a2141a7178653f.headline: Meta Names C.J. Mahoney as Chief Legal Officer

692a1f0ac683771255045632455c7bc7cd53a7db.summary: Following Maduro's ouster, Venezuela's government has detained journalists and civilians and deployed armed gangs as part of a widespread crackdown.
692a1f0ac683771255045632455c7bc7cd53a7db.headline: Venezuela Detains Journalists and Civilians After Maduro Ouster

19cd8d6fe53ee39ad691ec6567d730f32831e4cb.summary: A team of astronomers at the University of Missouri, led by Haojing Yan, reports discovering a group of galaxies with a previously unseen combination of features using data from NASA's James Webb Space Telescope.
19cd8d6fe53ee39ad691ec6567d730f32831e4cb.headline: Astronomers Identify Unique Galaxies Using Webb Telescope Data

4ad7d06511f8c4aac2c44c89ee2cdd8269ee0fc3.summary: Astronomers using NASA's James Webb Space Telescope have detected metallic iron dust and silicon carbide in the dwarf galaxy Sextans A. These rare dust types, produced by aging stars, were found in one of the most chemically primitive galaxies near the Milky Way.
4ad7d06511f8c4aac2c44c89ee2cdd8269ee0fc3.headline: James Webb Telescope Finds Rare Dust Types in Nearby Dwarf Galaxy

335bb70ae06a48210b77add7f387270a8ac20045.summary: President Trump met with House Republicans at the Kennedy Center, receiving strong support for a recent operation in Venezuela that resulted in the capture of Nicolás Maduro. Lawmakers in both chambers are requesting more details about the operation.
335bb70ae06a48210b77add7f387270a8ac20045.headline: Trump Meets House Republicans After Operation Captures Maduro in

df36d1d6a902fd16d45c65760c05e541b95c544a.summary: The CEO of CV Advisors stated that the surge in investment interest in Venezuela following the removal of Nicolas Maduro is premature, emphasizing that significant opportunities will not be available until democracy and rule of law are restored.
df36d1d6a902fd16d45c65760c05e541b95c544a.headline: CV Advisors CEO Cautions Against Early Investment in Venezuela

f5b673b15d0c7d79b093a46f72fe433de426fa5a.summary: Aldrich Ames, the CIA agent who spied for the Soviet Union and Russia and caused one of the most damaging intelligence breaches in U.S. history, has died in a Maryland prison at age 84. Ames admitted to passing information to Moscow for nearly a decade, betraying over 30 agents and compromising more than 100 operations.
f5b673b15d0c7d79b093a46f72fe433de426fa5a.headline: CIA Spy Aldrich Ames Dies in Prison at 84

fb1d362b3f97223f3e19899ad62c4e069a32deef.summary: President Trump has renewed calls for the U.S. to acquire Greenland, requesting an updated plan. Greenland's leaders and European officials have firmly rejected any possibility of U.S. ownership or control. Denmark's leader stated that such a move would end NATO, and European leaders continue to oppose Trump's assertions.
fb1d362b3f97223f3e19899ad62c4e069a32deef.headline: Trump Renews Greenland Acquisition Push

aeaa27e3ec43dcdc21961a3c70b37c68232f9216.summary: President Trump announced that Venezuela will transfer 30 to 50 million barrels of oil to the U.S., to be sold at market prices with proceeds controlled by him and allocated to benefit both countries. The agreement follows the U.S. capture of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro. U.S. oil executives are set to meet with Trump to discuss further operations in Venezuela.
aeaa27e3ec43dcdc21961a3c70b37c68232f9216.headline: Trump Announces Venezuela to Send Up to 50 Million Barrels of Oil

d3e3b8d9b2602536490ec3620a75daf666a209b0.summary: The Baltimore Ravens have fired head coach John Harbaugh after 18 seasons, following the team's failure to reach the NFL playoffs. Harbaugh, the most successful coach in franchise history, was dismissed less than 48 hours after a season-ending loss to the Pittsburgh Steelers. His departure adds to the current head coach openings across the NFL.
d3e3b8d9b2602536490ec3620a75daf666a209b0.headline: Baltimore Ravens Fire John Harbaugh After 18 Seasons as Head Coach

c60b2f84a62a0a0b23797c5322f85a4f8a770bd2.summary: The White House stated that Donald Trump is considering various options to acquire Greenland from Denmark, including the potential use of the U.S. military. European leaders have rejected the idea and expressed support for Denmark, opposing any U.S. takeover of the Arctic territory.

6495edbee56b731d896372c1a2637bf70dab5192.summary: Connor McDavid scored three goals, including one on a penalty shot, and Leon Draisaitl added a goal and two assists as the Edmonton Oilers defeated the Nashville Predators 6-2.

345b005865a20bfef25809d9453a7b386b49cc09.summary: Iranian security forces clashed with protesters at Tehran's Grand Bazaar, using teargas to disperse a sit-in as nationwide demonstrations continued. Activists abroad report that at least 36 people have been killed in violence related to the protests.
345b005865a20bfef25809d9453a7b386b49cc09.headline: Iranian Security Forces Clash With Protesters at Tehran Grand Bazaar

b05b0d2895927705e5172750db7160c7eb485e79.summary: Russia has deployed a submarine to escort a Russian-flagged tanker near Venezuela after the US attempted to seize the ship for alleged sanctions violations. The US Coast Guard has been pursuing the vessel, formerly known as the Bella 1, for two weeks as tensions between the US and Russia escalate over the incident.

dc7dd5ea1b41517044918b130ba07818966734ac.summary: Rep. Doug LaMalfa of California has died at age 65, reducing the Republican majority in the U.S. House of Representatives to 218-213 and further tightening control of the chamber.

e258d7474d428ec2d72ffbf92307b6563544ea51.summary: Archaeologists in Norfolk have discovered an Iron Age war trumpet, known as a carnyx, in an area once inhabited by a Celtic tribe led by Boudicca. Experts describe the find as extraordinarily rare and believe it may date to the period of conflict with the Roman army.
e258d7474d428ec2d72ffbf92307b6563544ea51.headline: Rare Iron Age War Trumpet Linked to Boudicca Found in Norfolk

f71300f46e867e22aa29d9d5a8b910393cc7d821.summary: Chevron and Quantum Energy Partners plan to jointly bid for the international assets of sanctioned Russian oil company Lukoil, according to the Financial Times. The Trump administration has indicated support for a proposal to divide Lukoil's international businesses.

Despite Bethell's performance, England ended the day eight wickets down and remain at risk of defeat to Australia.

3d3ad0984a966f90f14173da56d6c4d214ab4205.summary: European and Canadian leaders have expressed strong support for Greenland and Denmark following comments from US presidential aide Stephen Miller suggesting the US might seek control of Greenland. The statements prompted allied nations to oppose any US annexation efforts.

Secretary of State Marco Rubio outlined these demands to Venezuela's new leader, Delcy Rodríguez, during a classified meeting with senior congressional leaders on Monday.
af8ce9074822e8c0f77c827c41763c4fa00e1561.headline: Trump Urges Venezuela to Expel Agents from China

90df09bad2fe48524d0897f4dff644135685662f.summary: Michael Reagan, the eldest son of Ronald Reagan and a conservative commentator known for his talk radio show and contributions to Newsmax, has died at age 80. His death was announced by the Ronald Reagan Presidential Foundation and Institute. His family described him as a beloved husband, father, and grandfather.

41f2cfb3990f531f21df3fc5bff3d82c92b1963e.summary: Donald Trump's administration has frozen over $10 billion in federal childcare and family assistance funds to California, Colorado, Illinois, Minnesota, and New York. The decision follows political fallout in Minnesota related to a major fraud probe, and has been condemned by Democrats in the affected states.

Cuba has declared two days of mourning, while Venezuela has declared a week of mourning for those killed in the U.S. attack.

Other NHL highlights include the Seattle Kraken's 7-4 win over the Boston Bruins, the Toronto Maple Leafs' 4-1 win against the Florida Panthers, and the New York Islanders' 9-0 shutout of the New Jersey Devils. The Carolina Hurricanes, San Jose Sharks, Buffalo Sabres, and Philadelphia Flyers also recorded wins.

The defeat marks one of the worst losses for any NHL team this season, as the Devils continue to struggle after a strong start.
5f0f4f9af95ca570ed4b294e43410232b424dba1.headline: New Jersey Devils Suffer 9 0 Loss to New York Islanders

While Lego highlights the technology's potential, some early learning experts express concern that the new features could reduce opportunities for imaginative play.

The meeting follows urgent requests from Greenland and Denmark amid escalating tensions within NATO.

The move aims to address housing affordability and would affect buyout groups with significant residential holdings. Trump stated the action would be implemented immediately.

94a9e9754a4885dd9abb0b486f34070c570c5488.summary: A U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer shot and killed a woman during an immigration enforcement operation in Minneapolis on Wednesday. Federal officials said the shooting was in self-defense, while city officials, including Mayor Jacob Frey, disputed this claim and criticized ICE's presence in Minneapolis. The incident is under investigation.

Greenland and Denmark have reiterated that the island is not for sale. The U.S. has increased its military presence in the Caribbean, and the proposal has drawn criticism from Danish officials.

The UK supported the operation with military assistance. Russia has condemned the seizure as illegal and a violation of international law.

The UK and France recently reaffirmed their support for using soldiers to enforce a potential peace agreement, as discussions continue on security guarantees.

Discovery's board has unanimously rejected Paramount Skydance's revised $108.4 billion takeover bid, citing concerns over debt and calling the offer inadequate. Sprague was the first person to serve as both past president and CEO of the association.

95228d75e6a99173c707c6b80c01490491965b34.summary: A shooting involving federal law enforcement and Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agents occurred near East 34th Street and Portland Avenue in Minneapolis. The city has urged people to avoid the area. No further details about injuries or the circumstances have been released.

84eec97209f4dc2318a78d1c10aa0a9940195166.summary: Donald Trump urged Republicans to show flexibility on abortion restrictions to help reach an agreement on health care as negotiations over the Affordable Care Act remain unresolved.
84eec97209f4dc2318a78d1c10aa0a9940195166.headline: Trump Urges GOP Flexibility on Abortion to Advance Health Care Deal

da1bbf75f90032c1a623cc9163e9663b93b2a4b6.summary: Caleb Downs, a standout safety for Ohio State, has announced that he will enter the 2026 NFL draft. Downs made the announcement on social media and is considered a projected top-10 pick.

Cabrera is expected to join the front of the Cubs' rotation after a strong 2025 season.

b68105830ac67c5e7ea2396348cd76a4c967145b.summary: The Utah Mammoth will host the 2027 Discover NHL Winter Classic at Rice-Eccles Stadium at the University of Utah. Federal officials stated the shooting was in self-defense, while Mayor Jacob Frey and Minnesota Democrats disputed this, alleging the officer acted recklessly. Kennedy Jr. and Agriculture Secretary Brooke Rollins announced new U.S. dietary guidelines that recommend higher protein intake, less added sugar, and reduced consumption of highly processed foods. be345da76f67e6055b0c996464fa20b595967066.headline: U.S. Unveils New Dietary Guidelines Urging More Protein

The proposal aims to address concerns about corporate ownership affecting housing availability, though experts note institutional investors make up a small share of the market.
158c0073cabdb74fd72a6c7aacebcd5b27a900a2.headline: Trump Proposes Ban on Large Investors Buying Single Family Homes

f0a2be9868babece1fbb3f90340ff0a12c4da337.summary: President Trump stated that the US military budget for 2027 should be increased to $1.5 trillion, suggesting that revenue from tariffs would fund the higher spending.
f0a2be9868babece1fbb3f90340ff0a12c4da337.headline: Trump Proposes $1.5 Trillion US Military Budget for 2027

0884c204c1316097bb72ce6d3ac56565048e8864.summary: Manchester City drew 1-1 with Brighton, marking their third consecutive game without a win. Erling Haaland scored a first-half penalty for Manchester City, but Kaoru Mitoma equalized for Brighton with a goal from outside the box.
0884c204c1316097bb72ce6d3ac56565048e8864.headline: Manchester City Held to 1 1 Draw by Brighton

01715f0f8ab075514ba83c87316638149cfdb015.summary: The U.S. Coast Guard seized the Russian-flagged oil tanker Marinera in the North Atlantic, with support from the UK military. The vessel, linked to Venezuela, was one of two oil tankers recently taken into U.S. custody as part of actions targeting sanctioned oil shipments. Russia has protested the seizure, calling it a violation of maritime law.
01715f0f8ab075514ba83c87316638149cfdb015.headline: US Seizes Russian Flagged Marinera Oil Tanker Linked to Venezuela

1a9aa5f1ccbfcbd7dce3d50e3d0e03a4f9634ca2.summary: The U.S. announced it will control Venezuelan oil exports and sales indefinitely, easing some sanctions in exchange for continued oil shipments. Initial sales are expected to begin immediately, with revenue managed by the U.S. government. The Trump administration has also seized sanctioned Venezuelan oil tankers as part of these measures.
1a9aa5f1ccbfcbd7dce3d50e3d0e03a4f9634ca2.headline: U.S. to Control Venezuelan Oil Exports and Revenue Indefinitely

676d2453ae694c0cf8ffecf0bd8fe78ea8ec5983.summary: Warner Bros. Discovery's board has unanimously rejected Paramount Skydance's revised $108.4 billion leveraged buyout bid, citing concerns over financial and litigation risks and the potential for $87 billion in debt. The board stated the offer remains inadequate and will continue to favor its partnership with Netflix.
676d2453ae694c0cf8ffecf0bd8fe78ea8ec5983.headline: Warner Bros. Discovery Rejects Revised $108.4B Paramount Skydance Bid

ec78c17572b6caf4b8ce74fa88ce1d412ae5578b.summary: Donald Trump signed an order directing defense companies to halt stock buybacks and dividends. Shares of major defense firms, including General Dynamics, Lockheed Martin, and Northrop Grumman, declined after the announcement. Trump also called for increasing the military budget to $1.5 trillion and criticized defense companies for delivery failures.
ec78c17572b6caf4b8ce74fa88ce1d412ae5578b.headline: Trump Orders Defense Firms to Halt Buybacks and Dividends

9b2b0cc675639dbf9f80e9e0b7114213722025e5.summary: Secretary of State Marco Rubio and Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth briefed lawmakers on a three-part plan for Venezuela's future. Republicans supported the approach, but Democrats criticized it as lacking clear definition.
9b2b0cc675639dbf9f80e9e0b7114213722025e5.headline: Lawmakers Divided Over U.S. Three Part Plan for Venezuela

8c0b23e54443e0ac59b67844dfd0dbc0bf2fb256.summary: Donald Trump stated on January 5 that the US needs to acquire Greenland for defense, while adviser Stephen Miller expressed stronger support for the idea. The White House confirmed it is considering various options, including potential military deployment, to obtain the island, citing its critical mineral resources.
8c0b23e54443e0ac59b67844dfd0dbc0bf2fb256.headline: White House Considers Options to Acquire Greenland for US Interests

c1035aa20b7f1732040cd553d6a24cdaed15d052.summary: The Trump administration has ordered the withdrawal of the United States from the UN treaty that establishes international climate negotiations and from several international organizations, including the UN's population agency. The move could complicate future efforts to rejoin the Paris climate accord.
c1035aa20b7f1732040cd553d6a24cdaed15d052.headline: Trump Administration Orders Withdrawal From Key International Climate

b64fc9a203a4eb44b1e3696ca3b982042ff84eb1.summary: Hundreds protested in Minneapolis after an ICE officer fatally shot a woman during the start of a major immigration operation. The Department of Homeland Security deployed 2,000 officers in Minnesota for what it called its largest immigration operation to date.
b64fc9a203a4eb44b1e3696ca3b982042ff84eb1.headline: Protests Erupt in Minneapolis After ICE Officer Fatally Shoots Woman

93aa46496881ccc047ae0644a91ed2d799310a0f.summary: Keir Starmer announced that MPs will debate and vote before any UK troops are sent to Ukraine on peacekeeping duties. The UK and France have reiterated their readiness to send soldiers to support a peace deal, but deployment will require parliamentary approval.
93aa46496881ccc047ae0644a91ed2d799310a0f.headline: UK to Hold Parliamentary Vote Before Any Ukraine Peacekeeping

8e2b533a15ac6bc819ee87edea659b142cd2d3d7.summary: Nick Reiner's high-profile lawyer has withdrawn from his murder case, and public defenders will now represent him. His arraignment, originally scheduled for Wednesday, has been postponed. Reiner faces two counts of first-degree murder in the deaths of his parents, Rob Reiner and Michele Singer Reiner.
8e2b533a15ac6bc819ee87edea659b142cd2d3d7.headline: Nick Reiners Lawyer Withdraws

93108098421ac2a9d9efe81db844279f0fb8f6e0.summary: Darren Fletcher confirmed he will be on the touchline for Manchester United's FA Cup match against Brighton on Sunday. Meanwhile, Exeter City Supporters' Trust has requested a larger share of gate receipts from Manchester City for their upcoming FA Cup tie.
93108098421ac2a9d9efe81db844279f0fb8f6e0.headline: Fletcher to Lead Man United in FA Cup

fc4b5205265e1c37ab0bc086118b6888a8798219.summary: Cowboys owner Jerry Jones stated his goal is to retire with the most Super Bowl wins among NFL owners, saying he still has work to do to catch Patriots owner Robert Kraft.
fc4b5205265e1c37ab0bc086118b6888a8798219.headline: Jerry Jones Aims to Surpass Robert Kraft in Super Bowl Wins

d712227b58976b7d56bfde91250031780125c57a.summary: Victor Wembanyama scored 30 points off the bench in his return, but due to a minutes restriction, he sat out the final 3:46 as the Spurs lost to the Grizzlies by one point.
d712227b58976b7d56bfde91250031780125c57a.headline: Wembanyama Scores 30 in Return

401e61e43e2368b155fc2665e1ecf4548adbefb6.summary: Joshua Johnson's family was incorrectly informed by police that he survived a car crash in Yorkshire, after officers mistakenly identified him as Trevor Wynn, who survived. Joshua Johnson died in the December collision, and his family described the misidentification as an 'unimaginable' ordeal.
401e61e43e2368b155fc2665e1ecf4548adbefb6.headline: Family Mistakenly Told Son Survived Fatal Yorkshire Crash

6994fd1e0575570977691bfbe5ff317eb48aeefc.summary: Kevin Keegan, former England striker and manager, has been diagnosed with cancer and is receiving treatment. He was admitted to hospital with abdominal symptoms and expressed gratitude for the medical intervention and ongoing care.
6994fd1e0575570977691bfbe5ff317eb48aeefc.headline: Kevin Keegan Diagnosed With Cancer and Undergoing Treatment

b8e1c128e0cdfa5750098dc5c06bdf8136461d22.summary: Martin Chivers, the former Tottenham, Southampton, and England striker who scored 13 goals in 24 appearances for England, has died at the age of 80.
b8e1c128e0cdfa5750098dc5c06bdf8136461d22.headline: Former England Striker Martin Chivers Dies at 80

61173b731bff58008258fc2832a8341b2c963a89.summary: The Atlanta Hawks have traded four-time All-Star Trae Young to the Washington Wizards in exchange for CJ McCollum and Corey Kispert. No draft picks were included in the deal. The trade ends Young's seven-and-a-half season tenure with the Hawks and gives the Wizards a new starting guard.
61173b731bff58008258fc2832a8341b2c963a89.headline: Hawks Trade Trae Young to Wizards for McCollum and Kispert

60fd4b070010e1492780918e1666e1ecc2c811cd.summary: Senator Lindsey Graham stated that Trump has approved the advancement of a bipartisan bill in Congress to impose sanctions on Russia and countries purchasing Russian energy exports, in response to Russia's actions in Ukraine.
60fd4b070010e1492780918e1666e1ecc2c811cd.headline: Trump Approves Advancement of Bipartisan Russia Sanctions Bill

ada15c39ff514a8741403709c8b7e377b1921281.summary: Two people were killed and six others injured in a shooting outside a Salt Lake City church on Wednesday night while a memorial service was being held inside. Police stated the attack was not random or religiously motivated and a manhunt for the suspect is ongoing.
ada15c39ff514a8741403709c8b7e377b1921281.headline: Two Killed Six Injured in Salt Lake City Church Shooting

169db4e6e0ed4c9ca51832757dc3f6cde60cd36a.summary: A US immigration officer shot and killed a woman in a car on a residential street in Minneapolis. President Trump stated the officer acted in self-defense, claiming the woman tried to run over ICE agents. Local leaders and witnesses dispute this account, calling the shooting unjustified. Investigations are ongoing.
169db4e6e0ed4c9ca51832757dc3f6cde60cd36a.headline: Immigration Officer Fatally Shoots Woman in Minneapolis

f3f9ad80abaece8ce42a003e1df26362496e7b9e.summary: Canadian oil prices fell after U.S. actions targeting Venezuela's oil exports. Meanwhile, Denmark's leader warned that any U.S. attempt to seize Greenland would threaten the NATO alliance, as Greenland's strategic role has drawn renewed attention.
f3f9ad80abaece8ce42a003e1df26362496e7b9e.headline: Canadian Oil Falls Amid U.S. Moves on Venezuela and Greenland Tensions

c805acd6ce30e7a9ee349c93a62e7f678b2122ac.summary: Donald Trump has proposed increasing the U.S. military budget to $1.5 trillion for 2027, up from $901 billion in 2026. The announcement led to a rally in U.S. defense stocks, mirroring gains in European defense shares. Trump stated the higher spending is intended to secure the country during challenging times.
c805acd6ce30e7a9ee349c93a62e7f678b2122ac.headline: Trump Proposes $1.5 Trillion U.S. Military Budget for 2027

f5f3accb6116ab8a3b2edda9cd775f2e3ea0663c.summary: Australia defeated England by five wickets on the final day of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney, chasing a target of 160 runs. The win secured a 4-1 series victory for Australia, with Alex Carey hitting the winning runs. The match also marked Usman Khawaja's farewell as Australia's first Muslim cricketer.
f5f3accb6116ab8a3b2edda9cd775f2e3ea0663c.headline: Australia Win Fifth Ashes Test in Sydney to Seal 4 1 Series

a079496eccadf28b66322d4f04be237f52c003bd.summary: Google and Character.AI have agreed to settle lawsuits with families who alleged that their AI chatbots contributed to teen suicides. The terms of the settlements were not disclosed.
a079496eccadf28b66322d4f04be237f52c003bd.headline: Google and Character.AI Settle Lawsuits Over Chatbot Linked Teen

81ce116a3d5540852b210862a197c494f0d1db7d.summary: Trump spoke by phone with Colombia President Gustavo Petro and said a White House visit for Petro is being arranged by the secretary of state. Trump praised Petro's tone during the call and stated they will meet soon.
81ce116a3d5540852b210862a197c494f0d1db7d.headline: Trump and Colombias Petro Plan White House Meeting After Phone Call

5ea2d31d8df48774e3fca3dfb4c1eeb8c8e44665.summary: Donald Trump has announced the withdrawal of the US from 66 international and UN organizations, including the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change. The decision ends US participation in major forums on climate change, peace, and democracy, and has drawn criticism from experts.
5ea2d31d8df48774e3fca3dfb4c1eeb8c8e44665.headline: Trump Announces US Withdrawal from 66 International and UN Groups

3e3a84730da7f390c7eb4b9228c6a999705f95c3.summary: The Lebanese army announced it has established a state monopoly on weapons in southern Lebanon, describing the measure as effective and tangible. The army's statement did not mention Hezbollah.
3e3a84730da7f390c7eb4b9228c6a999705f95c3.headline: Lebanese Army Claims Effective State Monopoly on Arms in South

14a5741998ae22cd59301e05623508198ca1b347.summary: The Kansas City Chiefs stated they are aware of domestic violence allegations made by Rashee Rice's ex-girlfriend and are in communication with the NFL. The team declined to comment further on the matter.
14a5741998ae22cd59301e05623508198ca1b347.headline: Chiefs Acknowledge Domestic Violence Allegations Against Rashee Rice

556a7f716a0966c76a3c81c5edc01226ddf4b765.summary: The Trump administration has withdrawn the U.S. from 66 global organizations, including major UN climate agencies. This move may complicate future efforts to rejoin international agreements such as the Paris climate accord.
556a7f716a0966c76a3c81c5edc01226ddf4b765.headline: Trump Administration Withdraws U.S. From 66 Global Organizations

f015e387dd081975be08c2d52b64142a3fcf105d.summary: Heavy snow and ice in parts of Europe have grounded hundreds of flights, leaving more than 1,000 passengers stranded overnight at Amsterdam's international airport. Travel disruptions have also affected highways across the region.
f015e387dd081975be08c2d52b64142a3fcf105d.headline: Snow and Ice Disrupt Flights and Travel Across Europe

50aac5ff4e5225eb09b1014ae2e2201ecc2f4ab1.summary: Oil prices rose after a US inventory draw and ongoing geopolitical tensions, including US seizure of a Russian-flagged oil tanker linked to Venezuela. The US continues oversight of Venezuelan affairs, with officials emphasizing stability and recovery. Chevron is seeking an expanded license to operate in Venezuela, while US oil firms request investment guarantees.
50aac5ff4e5225eb09b1014ae2e2201ecc2f4ab1.headline: Oil Prices Rise as US Seizes Tanker and Weighs Venezuela Policy

0e80b976842d7b777c17c6837e3920b3976a845f.summary: Terry Yorath, former Leeds and Wales midfielder, has died at age 75 after a short illness, according to his family. Yorath was a league champion with Leeds in 1974, earned 59 caps for Wales, and later managed the Welsh national team, narrowly missing qualification for the 1994 World Cup.
0e80b976842d7b777c17c6837e3920b3976a845f.headline: Terry Yorath Former Leeds and Wales Midfielder Dies at 75

17c1d0c71e6d667db5c0e533356224c5c0167bb5.summary: Donald Trump announced plans to ban large institutional investors from purchasing additional single-family homes, stating he is taking immediate steps toward this ban. Experts note that institutional investors currently represent a small portion of the U.S. housing market.
17c1d0c71e6d667db5c0e533356224c5c0167bb5.headline: Trump Announces Plan to Ban Large Investors From Buying Single Family

5d420cf5165f5480adc7f67a75cd0d9d536ac3ae.summary: Yemeni separatist leader and several officials left Yemen with assistance from the United Arab Emirates, according to the Saudi-led coalition. The officials reportedly became unreachable after being invited to Saudi Arabia for talks amid escalating conflict.
5d420cf5165f5480adc7f67a75cd0d9d536ac3ae.headline: Yemeni Separatist Leader Leaves Country With Emirati Help

21ac6940586f2ee411b9a83bd5a356705c57fbbe.summary: The U.S. government announced it will control Venezuelan oil exports and oversee the proceeds from their sale indefinitely. Sanctions on Venezuela will be eased to allow oil shipments to the U.S. to begin immediately, with sales expected to start at 30 to 50 million barrels. The U.S. seized two sanctioned oil tankers as part of this policy.

Reiner, the son of Hollywood director Rob Reiner, appeared in a Los Angeles court and is now represented by a public defender. Jackson cited circumstances beyond his and Reiner's control for ending his representation.
9c707cad5516250973d69795b08bcf06f573c351.headline: Alan Jackson Withdraws as Lawyer for Nick Reiner in Murder Case

9a4c22c4b3bcfd321b0ef8e960bc23f8b950d608.summary: Trump signed an order directing U.S. defense companies to halt stock buybacks and dividends until they increase military production and maintenance. He also called for reduced executive pay and faster delivery of equipment. Shares of major defense firms fell after the announcement.
9a4c22c4b3bcfd321b0ef8e960bc23f8b950d608.headline: Trump Orders Defense Firms to Halt Buybacks

7306cd390c81451760f96ad64af44dfb54c7078a.headline: Trump Threatens to End Raytheon Contracts Over Stock Buybacks

b4065c55f15f23d38efe02c9a9036c9aa56f698a.summary: The Chicago Cubs have acquired pitcher Edward Cabrera from the Miami Marlins in exchange for outfielder Owen Caissie and infield prospects Cristian Hernandez and Edgardo De Leon. Cabrera joins the Cubs after posting a 3.53 ERA in 2025.
b4065c55f15f23d38efe02c9a9036c9aa56f698a.headline: Cubs Acquire Edward Cabrera From Marlins in Three Player Trade

419452b1901102dbf129ddf8fe82293ee84d390a.summary: Donald Trump is seeking over $6 million in legal fees from the office of Fani Willis after the Georgia election interference case against him was dismissed.
419452b1901102dbf129ddf8fe82293ee84d390a.headline: Trump Seeks Over $6 Million in Legal Fees After Georgia Case Dismissed

7cc44b97ae7b53b64ea5086d6e62917abb8b9fe2.summary: The Trump administration announced the United States will withdraw from 66 international organizations, mainly U.N.-related agencies and panels focused on climate, labor, and diversity issues, as part of a continued move away from global cooperation.
7cc44b97ae7b53b64ea5086d6e62917abb8b9fe2.headline: US to Withdraw From 66 International Organizations

668f9c8e730f4c5b32b906d70a210f191a627867.summary: Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones stated his goal is to retire as the NFL owner with the most Super Bowl wins, acknowledging he needs to surpass the Patriots' Robert Kraft and still has work to do to achieve this.
668f9c8e730f4c5b32b906d70a210f191a627867.headline: Jerry Jones Aims to Surpass Kraft in Super Bowl Wins as Cowboys

aefc87461ab3d95d4041c81fc3604a9244527447.summary: Aryna Sabalenka, the world No 1, says she plans to skip some tennis events this year to protect her health, despite expecting possible sanctions from the WTA Tour.
aefc87461ab3d95d4041c81fc3604a9244527447.headline: Aryna Sabalenka Plans to Skip Events Despite Possible WTA Sanctions

87567a1a763940cf9bb5da367e572e947eec1434.summary: Brusdar Graterol, Braxton Garrett, and Hayden Wesneski agreed to one-year contracts to avoid arbitration. Graterol's deal with the Dodgers is reported to be worth $2.8 million.
87567a1a763940cf9bb5da367e572e947eec1434.headline: Graterol Garrett and Wesneski Sign One Year Deals to Avoid Arbitration

0ec0214958897dcf962c27b89d8eab03edd96ab6.summary: Clashes between Syrian government forces and Kurdish-led groups have intensified in Aleppo, prompting civilians to flee the city. Efforts to integrate the Kurdish-led Syrian Democratic Forces into the national military have stalled, contributing to renewed violence.
0ec0214958897dcf962c27b89d8eab03edd96ab6.headline: Civilians Flee Aleppo Amid Renewed Clashes Between Syrian and Kurdish

ba67f5fd507d50bd7fa151d2949ad6012b2755d3.summary: One Battle After Another and The Studio received the most nominations for this year's Actor awards, which were previously known as the SAG awards. Paul Thomas Anderson’s epic thriller and Apple’s comedy series also led nominations, with strong showings for Sinners and Adolescence.
ba67f5fd507d50bd7fa151d2949ad6012b2755d3.headline: One Battle After Another and The Studio Lead Actor Awards Nominations

940424f93c53ead94a16672c59fde77c69372260.summary: The US Senate voted 52-47 to advance a bipartisan war powers resolution requiring Donald Trump to seek congressional approval for further military action in Venezuela. Five Republicans joined Democrats in supporting the measure, which follows the recent US raid to capture Nicolás Maduro. A final vote is expected next week, but the resolution is unlikely to become law.
940424f93c53ead94a16672c59fde77c69372260.headline: Senate Advances Measure to Limit Trumps Military Action in Venezuela

bb0d3bb5ea29e2cf309c72121f6cd2fb4309f80e.summary: The Miami Dolphins have fired head coach Mike McDaniel after four seasons. The decision follows two consecutive seasons missing the playoffs and a 7-10 finish. Miami will search for a new head coach and is expected to make additional changes in the offseason.
bb0d3bb5ea29e2cf309c72121f6cd2fb4309f80e.headline: Miami Dolphins Fire Head Coach Mike McDaniel After Four Seasons

aa7524d1067a899fc3d97a15671d58f63d2ffb5a.summary: Venezuela's National Assembly president Jorge Rodríguez announced the release of a significant number of prisoners, including political detainees and foreigners, as a gesture to consolidate peace. The move comes days after the US seized Nicolás Maduro and is seen as an act of conciliation by Venezuela's interim government.
aa7524d1067a899fc3d97a15671d58f63d2ffb5a.headline: Venezuela Announces Release of Prisoners as Peace Gesture

b51061f844556bf9a14ed765620714f102c4f0b5.summary: The Atlanta Hawks have traded Trae Young to the Washington Wizards in exchange for CJ McCollum and Corey Kispert. No draft picks were included in the deal. Young spent over seven seasons with the Hawks before the trade, which was confirmed by multiple sources on Wednesday.
b51061f844556bf9a14ed765620714f102c4f0b5.headline: Hawks Trade Trae Young to Wizards for McCollum and Kispert

1685bc6c8a4c6c4ad0f9606c1033ff8e7df419ef.summary: Renee Nicole Macklin Good, a 37-year-old mother of three, was shot and killed by a U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) officer in Minneapolis on Wednesday. The incident, captured on video, has sparked nationwide protests and political conflict, with Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey demanding ICE leave the city. An official investigation is ongoing.
1685bc6c8a4c6c4ad0f9606c1033ff8e7df419ef.headline: ICE Officer Fatally Shoots Woman in Minneapolis

0d832e1e75f075b4161beebcf021b30feb1df296.summary: The Kansas City Chiefs stated they are aware of domestic violence allegations made in social media posts by a former girlfriend of wide receiver Rashee Rice. The team said it is in communication with the NFL and will have no further comment at this time.
0d832e1e75f075b4161beebcf021b30feb1df296.headline: Chiefs Acknowledge Domestic Violence Allegations Against Rashee Rice

e106a05b206e06e07a31eaa15370dda4e85fbbbb.summary: Giannis Antetokounmpo stated he will not request a trade from the Milwaukee Bucks, saying he plans to stay with the team for his entire career and dismissing trade rumors.
e106a05b206e06e07a31eaa15370dda4e85fbbbb.headline: Giannis Antetokounmpo Says He Will Not Request Trade From Bucks

0c68c67e7ae290491de926a9aa1fda0cc8fe526e.summary: The Supreme Court is reviewing tariffs imposed during Trump's administration, with a decision expected to impact U.S. trade policy and government finances. Investors are monitoring potential government refunds to importers, while the Treasury secretary has called for further interest-rate cuts.
0c68c67e7ae290491de926a9aa1fda0cc8fe526e.headline: Supreme Court Reviews Trump Era Tariffs With Trade and Fiscal Impact

ef15e4a3950b250e02cb88512b3c1205612c331f.summary: Saudi Arabia has accused the United Arab Emirates of helping Aidarous al-Zubaidi, leader of the Southern Transitional Council, flee Yemen. Al-Zubaidi reportedly did not attend crisis talks in Riyadh, and Saudi officials claim the UAE smuggled him out of the country.
ef15e4a3950b250e02cb88512b3c1205612c331f.headline: Saudi Arabia Accuses UAE of Smuggling Yemen Separatist Leader

90f37d770ca2b8485b0ce7f2d5c949aeb34bf09c.summary: Iran experienced a nationwide internet blackout as protests over economic conditions spread. Reports indicate security forces have killed at least 45 people since the demonstrations began. The blackout is part of increased government efforts to suppress protests, according to monitoring group NetBlocks.
90f37d770ca2b8485b0ce7f2d5c949aeb34bf09c.headline: Iran Imposes Nationwide Internet Blackout Amid Widespread Protests

c28fc49300ca292db7f5326601878b68ef32b5f8.summary: Harvey Weinstein is considering a guilty plea to resolve an undecided third-degree rape charge and avoid a third trial in New York, according to a judge. No final decision has been made on the plea as of January 8, 2026.
c28fc49300ca292db7f5326601878b68ef32b5f8.headline: Harvey Weinstein Considers Guilty Plea to Avoid Third New York Trial

2bc9728e80b80618d6e484b618bdfc0521d211f6.summary: A new study finds that some dogs can learn the names of new objects by overhearing humans, similar to how toddlers learn words. Researchers observed that certain dogs can pick up words using cues such as people's gaze, gestures, and voices, demonstrating advanced learning abilities.
2bc9728e80b80618d6e484b618bdfc0521d211f6.headline: Study Shows Some Dogs Learn Words by Overhearing Humans

9ab9268eae43b770bc0d2171acfe8a6aa2402623.summary: Defense stocks rose globally after Trump announced plans to increase the annual U.S. military budget by 50% to $1.5 trillion. Aerospace and defense ETFs are outperforming the S&P 500 in early 2026, with both U.S. and European defense shares rallying.
9ab9268eae43b770bc0d2171acfe8a6aa2402623.headline: Defense Stocks Surge After Trump Proposes Major U.S. Military Budget

7f0dd45bc49dccbf5a7d4b7b7740fe0661843206.summary: Gov. Kathy Hochul and Mayor Zohran Mamdani have announced a plan to provide free child care for 2-year-olds in New York City. The proposal aims to make child care more accessible to families and is set to be unveiled soon.
7f0dd45bc49dccbf5a7d4b7b7740fe0661843206.headline: Hochul and Mamdani Announce Free Child Care Plan for NYC 2 Year

dc23f50ab3bace54828a8bf15d15a0997cdfc1d6.summary: Arsenal and Liverpool are set to play in a Premier League match in North London on January 8, 2026. Arsenal have nearly a full squad available, missing only Riccardo Calafiori, while Liverpool will be without Hugo Ekitike. The match is scheduled to kick off at 8pm GMT.
dc23f50ab3bace54828a8bf15d15a0997cdfc1d6.headline: Arsenal and Liverpool Set for Premier League Match in North London

d0a798456ac2f3650632e85261f62c97c13ec6c7.summary: Israeli forces killed at least seven Palestinians in separate strikes in the Gaza Strip, according to medics. The military stated it targeted the site of a failed militant rocket launch. The incident is the latest in ongoing violence that threatens the ceasefire between Hamas and Israel.

Ukrainian officials reported four deaths in Kyiv from overnight attacks. Russia claimed the strike was retaliation for an alleged drone attack, which Ukraine dismissed as unfounded.

9f0cadee20cac116548363224d2846624871b65b.summary: Rio Tinto and Glencore have confirmed they are in talks for an all-stock deal that, if completed, would create the world's largest mining company. The discussions follow previous failed negotiations between the two companies nearly a year ago. No agreement has been finalized.

The incident comes a day after an ICE officer fatally shot a woman in Minneapolis. Portland police are investigating and have urged calm as protests over ICE actions grow.

a5ea9d34a6886f5e1fc38a0113d7d62c0ecdb740.summary: Donald Trump announced he will meet with Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado next week. Trump stated it would be an honor to accept her Nobel Peace Prize if she chose to share it with him. He also commented that Venezuela does not set a precedent for China regarding Taiwan, saying the decision is up to Xi Jinping.

794af34631d75a439786092169499e0d0098b015.summary: Donald Trump announced he is instructing his representatives to buy $200 billion in mortgage bonds, aiming to lower interest rates and monthly housing payments. Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac have been increasing their mortgage bond holdings, but 30-year fixed mortgage rates remain above 6%.

The officer, identified as Jonathan Ross, was named in court records. The incident has sparked protests in Minneapolis and other cities, and law enforcement agencies are disputing control over the investigation. An official inquiry into the shooting is ongoing.

The vote is largely symbolic but highlights Congress's role in authorizing the use of force.

c69fc44e124ea0f4f2b80bb8ac9407bc84473410.summary: Russia launched its new hypersonic Oreshnik missile at a target in Ukraine near the NATO border during a large-scale overnight attack, marking the second known use of the weapon. Moretti is being held as a potential flight risk. Switzerland observed a national day of mourning for the victims.

The incident has led to public protests, demands for transparency from city officials, and a federal plan to deploy more agents in Minnesota. Videos of the shooting have surfaced, and investigations into the circumstances are ongoing amid conflicting accounts.

Morant has faced injuries and a suspension this season, and the team is currently below .500 and out of playoff contention. The market for a Morant trade is described as small.

In response, authorities have imposed an internet blackout across the country and warned of a harsh crackdown. The protests are driven by economic grievances and demands for political reform.

The deal was backed despite opposition from some European farmers and the French government, and is intended to open new markets amid global trade tensions.

The move comes after criticism from authorities, but European officials remain dissatisfied with the response.
f8f1c1dafd9b2eab7eb94b377f677e11879a217d.headline: Grok on X Restricts Image Generation to Paid Users After Deepfake

4e7f7ed55a72e4f17a58129d3c8858c6a79d27bf.summary: Donald Trump announced he has canceled a planned second wave of attacks on Venezuela, citing increased cooperation from Venezuela on oil infrastructure. He stated that U.S. oil companies will invest at least $100 billion in the country. A large U.S. naval presence will remain in the region.
4e7f7ed55a72e4f17a58129d3c8858c6a79d27bf.headline: Trump Cancels Second Attack on Venezuela

2d3c802405d0c9e9f2942f14bbacc17418e4ccfb.summary: OpenAI and SoftBank have jointly invested $1 billion in SB Energy to support the development of large-scale data centers in the US for artificial intelligence applications.

The vote asserts Congress's role in decisions involving the use of force, following a recent raid to capture Nicolás Maduro. The measure is largely symbolic.

The slower job growth signals a cooling labor market after years of strong gains, with mixed data showing low hiring by companies but some employment gains reported by households.

The firm plans to invest in areas including artificial intelligence and defense startups. Co-founder Ben Horowitz stated that this amount represents 18% of all U.S. venture capital allocated in 2025.

acb3cb621817b5922341917de4104c6f7dba8b25.summary: Experts and analysts have released their picks and betting predictions for the 2026 College Football Playoff semifinal between the Oregon Ducks and Indiana Hoosiers in the Peach Bowl, as well as for the upcoming NFL Wildcard Weekend games, including Eagles-49ers, Jaguars-Bills, Steelers-Texans, and Patriots-Chargers.

0ec4aaaba9a7b01a3616ba6ad9ca3c6d54ddb6fd.summary: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei accused protesters of being influenced by the US and vowed authorities would not back down amid ongoing demonstrations. Iranian officials indicated further crackdowns as protests continued for a second day.

b0fda34f82089566689401536668e380726e6400.summary: A delegation from Yemen's Southern Transitional Council in Riyadh announced the group's dissolution, but other officials abroad rejected the move, saying it was not voluntary. The status of the group's disbandment remains disputed among its members.

21c7ef8b6445dd1a2ab73c5955963c5f7ab99099.summary: The NCAA has denied Ole Miss quarterback Trinidad Chambliss' request for a sixth year of eligibility, according to an announcement on Friday. Chambliss, who transferred from Division II Ferris State, will not be able to play another season for the Rebels.

70b4c52cde4ff011b5cb8a76a1e6ca25c7893ce2.summary: Storm Goretti caused widespread power outages and travel disruptions across northern Europe. Nearly 400,000 homes in France lost electricity, and Germany faced strong winds, heavy snowfall, and school closures as authorities responded to hazardous conditions.

255a380834e450ba87b35a1b003f9997bf20114a.headline: Brooks Koepka Applies for PGA Tour Reinstatement After LIV Golf Exit

7f9a1ef2886f9b494d5648e6326eba7bde2b754e.summary: Kevin Durant moved into seventh place on the NBA's all-time scoring list, surpassing Wilt Chamberlain by scoring his 31,422nd point with a third-quarter 3-pointer during the Houston Rockets' 111-105 loss to the Portland Trail Blazers.
7f9a1ef2886f9b494d5648e6326eba7bde2b754e.headline: Kevin Durant Passes Wilt Chamberlain for Seventh on NBA Scoring List

63445f83c148f0ba3394348f032ceaa91f6e63b1.summary: U.S. oil executives expressed caution about investing in Venezuela despite Donald Trump's push for a $100 billion investment plan. Executives cited past asset seizures and unclear security conditions. Oil companies signaled they may invest if terms improve, but currently consider Venezuela too risky.
63445f83c148f0ba3394348f032ceaa91f6e63b1.headline: Oil Executives Wary of Trumps $100 Billion Venezuela Investment Plan

6bac5c36a397f6e04b60219eb1851acc86402452.summary: The Washington Commanders have hired David Blough as their offensive coordinator after two years as an assistant quarterbacks coach, according to multiple sources.

79db18e0203c6fc94887b05ac7160f4ef0892f01.summary: Russia launched a large-scale overnight attack on Ukraine, firing 242 drones and 36 missiles, including the nuclear-capable hypersonic Oreshnik missile near Lviv. Ukrainian officials confirmed at least four people were killed. This marks only the second use of the Oreshnik missile, with Russia claiming it was in retaliation for a drone attack that Ukraine and others deny occurred.

eab7c838c5b3ae2a71a7e1721e446bd707332fe9.summary: Donald Trump has reiterated his intention for the US to acquire Greenland, stating the US may act with or without Denmark's consent. Denmark maintains that Greenland is not for sale. The Trump administration has not ruled out the use of military force to gain control of the territory.

The footage, now public, captures the incident from the officer's perspective. The shooting has led to ongoing protests and heightened tensions in the city, with demonstrations planned in Richmond.

Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has condemned the protesters and blamed the US for the unrest, while authorities have signaled further crackdowns amid economic hardship.

890315a447f0bf4dff8fe62f5411c351f5ba59b2.summary: US State Department officials are visiting Caracas to discuss diplomatic relations with Venezuela, following the military abduction of Nicolas Maduro less than a week ago. The visit reflects ongoing shifts in the relationship between the two countries.

Sullivan, previously the Packers' vice president of player personnel since 2022, will lead the search for Miami's next head coach and address key roster decisions.

The market for Morant is reportedly limited, but the Grizzlies are considering potential deals.

55950f3c2f4055ac4eae85fedd0a3dbc03011403.headline: Alex Bregman Agrees to Five Year

This marks Chelsea's largest debut win under a new manager since 2008. The team advances to the fourth round of the competition.
dbffcfec375bb83dc67a256f1d3fe5b5c3f4b023.headline: Liam Rosenior Wins First Match as Chelsea Head Coach With 5 1

0545bb8691db4dc34f270cff4c3aa1df62e8ff02.summary: Thousands protested in Minneapolis and across the US after Renee Nicole Good, a mother of three, was fatally shot by an ICE agent. Demonstrators gathered at the site of the shooting and called for justice, with over 1,000 protests against ICE expected nationwide on Saturday.
0545bb8691db4dc34f270cff4c3aa1df62e8ff02.headline: Nationwide Protests After ICE Agent Fatally Shoots Renee Nicole Good

ad9cc837154a1fd8a1310ac029ba3bd1d37beeba.summary: Matthew Stafford threw a 19-yard touchdown pass to Colby Parkinson with 38 seconds remaining, giving the Los Angeles Rams a 34-31 win over the Carolina Panthers. The Rams advance to the Divisional Round of the NFL playoffs after the wild-card victory.
ad9cc837154a1fd8a1310ac029ba3bd1d37beeba.headline: Rams Defeat Panthers 34 31 With Late Touchdown to Advance in Playoffs

35b5f1392e5edf37691970303d9c308442cf196b.summary: Recent remarks by Donald Trump about annexing Canada have raised concerns in Canada, following his previous comments on Venezuela and Greenland. NATO has not yet issued a public statement addressing the territorial integrity of the Arctic island or Denmark.
35b5f1392e5edf37691970303d9c308442cf196b.headline: Trumps Annexation Comments Raise Concerns in Canada

ae82ca7274a8e0c8c62101d58bfca74c9324ba81.summary: NFL Wild Card Weekend for the 2026 playoffs has begun, featuring matchups including Packers vs. Bears, Rams vs. Panthers, 49ers vs. Eagles, Bills vs. Jaguars, and Chargers vs. Patriots. SportsLine and CBS Sports provided betting analysis and predictions, while updated schedules and playoff brackets were released. Game highlights and betting tips are available for fans and bettors.
ae82ca7274a8e0c8c62101d58bfca74c9324ba81.headline: 2026 NFL Wild Card Weekend Kicks Off With Key Matchups and Betting

f37fb92413cd5982aa12732fec52e9928d50d36e.summary: Syrian army forces have taken control of Aleppo's Sheikh Maqsoud area after a week of violent clashes. The last Kurdish SDF fighters have left the city, according to the Aleppo governor. Dozens have been killed and over 150,000 people displaced as a result of the fighting. A deal to end the clashes was announced early Sunday.
f37fb92413cd5982aa12732fec52e9928d50d36e.headline: Syrian Army Takes Control of Aleppos Sheikh Maqsoud After Clashes

b8f197b24d007e372b6448fee1c4c76e62868349.summary: Sacramento Kings guard Dennis Schröder has been suspended for three games without pay after attempting to strike another player following a Kings-Lakers game in December, the NBA announced Saturday.
b8f197b24d007e372b6448fee1c4c76e62868349.headline: Kings Dennis Schröder Suspended Three Games for Postgame Incident

a7d88b39fd0bde4de4d2978ff76b379b211e79a0.summary: Israel is on high alert due to concerns about possible US intervention in Iran, according to multiple sources. The heightened alert comes as civil unrest presents a significant challenge to the Islamic republic.
a7d88b39fd0bde4de4d2978ff76b379b211e79a0.headline: Israel on High Alert Over Possible US Intervention in Iran

a021d184f43540d9d900841adeffba598a7009ec.summary: The Rockies have traded minor league pitcher Josh Grosz to the Diamondbacks in exchange for outfielder Jake McCarthy. McCarthy, 28, spent five seasons with the Diamondbacks and finished fourth in the 2022 National League Rookie of the Year voting.
a021d184f43540d9d900841adeffba598a7009ec.headline: Rockies Acquire Jake McCarthy from Diamondbacks for Josh Grosz

7912fc3b6c68a206fed4365727856fa7f7e85cbd.summary: Bob Weir, co-founder and rhythm guitarist of the Grateful Dead, has died at age 78, according to a statement on his verified Instagram account. Weir was a central figure in the band and its spin-offs for over six decades.
7912fc3b6c68a206fed4365727856fa7f7e85cbd.headline: Grateful Dead Co Founder Bob Weir Dies at 78

c0d2ea169169d0bb3954b9fac6d9d752e624a9bb.summary: Myanmar held the second stage of a military-run election, with polls open in 100 townships and the military reporting 52 percent turnout in the first round. The UN, many western countries, and human rights groups have criticized the election as lacking opposition and credibility. Some areas, such as Hpapun, saw little or no participation.
c0d2ea169169d0bb3954b9fac6d9d752e624a9bb.headline: Myanmar Holds Second Stage of Military Run Election Amid Criticism

dafc2803e751d140db93b69992e26e63e619a9a4.summary: The Chicago Bears rallied from an 18-point deficit to defeat the Green Bay Packers 31-27 in a wild-card playoff game, securing their first playoff win in 15 years and advancing to the NFL's Divisional Round. Caleb Williams threw a decisive 25-yard touchdown pass to DJ Moore with under two minutes remaining.
dafc2803e751d140db93b69992e26e63e619a9a4.headline: Chicago Bears Rally Past Packers for First Playoff Win in 15 Years

49e316f379c76df4fc0c1d5031fe3464f0d3ef48.summary: Jaylen Brown criticized NBA referees following the Boston Celtics' loss to the San Antonio Spurs, expressing frustration with the officiating after the game.
49e316f379c76df4fc0c1d5031fe3464f0d3ef48.headline: Jaylen Brown Criticizes Referees After Celtics Loss to Spurs

2c6e25a0bdaa16117022833e083cd15812fc97a6.summary: Aryna Sabalenka, ranked world number one, won her third Brisbane International title by defeating Marta Kostyuk 6-4, 6-3 in the final. Sabalenka secured back-to-back championships at the event as she prepares for the upcoming Australian Open.
2c6e25a0bdaa16117022833e083cd15812fc97a6.headline: Aryna Sabalenka Wins Third Brisbane International Title

e2172d3cba1e9b9755aebe77d9402b6410e56509.summary: Kemi Badenoch announced that a future Conservative government would ban mobile phones in schools and introduce age limits to restrict social media use for under-16s, following Australia's recent policy. A teachers’ union also supports a social media ban in schools.
e2172d3cba1e9b9755aebe77d9402b6410e56509.headline: Kemi Badenoch Pledges School Phone Ban and Social Media Age Limits

b891b68f29f3bd01395c025fd20373548cfc4fc1.summary: Dennis Schroder, point guard for the Kings, has been suspended for three games by the NBA after confronting and attempting to hit Luka Doncic following a loss to the Lakers on December 28.
b891b68f29f3bd01395c025fd20373548cfc4fc1.headline: Dennis Schroder Suspended Three Games After Incident With Luka Doncic

28d3579f8273079920812e43c5ba82515953a9a2.summary: Japan's ruling coalition partner stated that Prime Minister Takaichi may call an early election, indicating discussions about a possible snap vote are ongoing.
28d3579f8273079920812e43c5ba82515953a9a2.headline: Japan PM Takaichi May Call Early Election

e87406098153c833e7d83b58df209944c29ea93f.summary: Rescuers in the central Philippines have detected 'signs of life' after a garbage avalanche at a landfill killed at least four workers and left more than 30 missing. Search efforts are being intensified, according to officials.
e87406098153c833e7d83b58df209944c29ea93f.headline: Rescuers Intensify Search After Philippine Landfill Avalanche

6da6bab59bf74f09114b3df6f55a8e2c6dbe4348.summary: Donald Trump has signed an order to block access to Venezuelan oil revenue held in the US, aiming to prevent judicial actions against these funds and support stability efforts in Venezuela.
6da6bab59bf74f09114b3df6f55a8e2c6dbe4348.headline: Trump Blocks Access to Venezuelan Oil Revenue Held in US

ed5e7d6f5d2b43773b4ead54634c487d6e51ce2d.summary: The US may lift additional sanctions on Venezuela as soon as next week, according to Bessent. Discussions are ongoing, and the move could impact economic relations between the two countries.
ed5e7d6f5d2b43773b4ead54634c487d6e51ce2d.headline: US May Lift More Venezuela Sanctions Next Week

0e506e4ed990b4e4cf59ff24eab8f3606c6108a9.summary: The Green Bay Packers lost to the Chicago Bears 31-27 in a Wild Card playoff game on Saturday after leading by 18 points at halftime. The Packers played without right tackle Zach Tom.
0e506e4ed990b4e4cf59ff24eab8f3606c6108a9.headline: Packers Lose Wild Card to Bears After Blowing 18 Point Lead

96b1092cae06c24cdd136acc406cf559acb00307.summary: The US military and allied forces conducted large-scale strikes against the Islamic State in Syria on Saturday, following a December attack in which two US service members and an interpreter were killed. The operation is part of ongoing military responses targeting the group in Syria.
96b1092cae06c24cdd136acc406cf559acb00307.headline: US and Allies Launch Major Strikes Against Islamic State in Syria

1648ca361151d5dc9ea0ab62be66fb98482d3837.summary: A 24-year-old suspect has been charged with murder after six people, including a 7-year-old girl and several family members, were killed in a shooting on Friday in northeast Mississippi, according to authorities.
1648ca361151d5dc9ea0ab62be66fb98482d3837.headline: Six Killed in Northeast Mississippi Shooting

e9190f5f9a899dc6989e9b8d2ec138c10ba1dfd6.summary: Activists report that 116 people have died in violence linked to protests challenging Iran's theocracy. Iranian authorities have threatened demonstrators with severe charges, including labeling participants as 'enemies of God,' which can carry the death penalty.
