Butler was injured in the third quarter after a collision with Davion Mitchell and had to be helped off the court. News of the ACL tear was confirmed hours after the game.
ba13a7ebf84b96ba4740fbec2f87093cce9c6246.headline: Warriors Jimmy Butler Out for Season With Torn ACL

5d3e8028aa89b43ad329ab8013dbfc324514d698.summary: Jonathan Toews received a prolonged standing ovation in his first game back in Chicago with the Winnipeg Jets, but the Jets lost 2-0 to the Chicago Blackhawks. Spencer Knight made 32 saves for a shutout, Jason Dickinson scored, and Connor Bedard added an empty-net goal, marking his first since returning from injury. The Blackhawks ended a three-game losing streak.
5d3e8028aa89b43ad329ab8013dbfc324514d698.headline: Blackhawks Defeat Jets 2 0 as Toews Receives Ovation in Chicago Return

49194e9fdf00be077bb9b5eaa65055d6715439d4.summary: Japan's 40-year government bond yield reached 4% for the first time since its 2007 introduction, as traders sold sovereign debt amid concerns over increased fiscal spending following a snap election call that could give PM Sanae Takaichi a mandate.
49194e9fdf00be077bb9b5eaa65055d6715439d4.headline: Japans 40 Year Bond Yield Reaches 4% Amid Snap Election Concerns

f3451f77e0a9d7ec10998b43bd059b0a4f73b66c.summary: Indiana defeated Miami 27-21 to win the college football national championship. Coach Curt Cignetti led Indiana to an undefeated season and the title in his second year with the team.
f3451f77e0a9d7ec10998b43bd059b0a4f73b66c.headline: Indiana Wins College Football National Championship Under Curt

4b00331f6ddf359371c8de79ee91b6185d0438ed.summary: Authorities have closed dozens of beaches along Australia's east coast, including many in Sydney, following four shark attacks in New South Wales since Sunday. The most recent incident involved a surfer who sustained minor injuries. Officials are warning people to avoid waterways after recent rainfall, which experts say attracts sharks to beach areas.
4b00331f6ddf359371c8de79ee91b6185d0438ed.headline: Dozens of Australian East Coast Beaches Closed After Shark Attacks

7a0aa4b4811d6731343ced1d58e9a888c59a79a2.summary: At least 39 people were killed when two high-speed trains collided near Córdoba in southern Spain. The cause of the accident is unknown, and officials say the death toll may rise as rescue and recovery operations continue. Spain will observe three days of mourning starting Tuesday.
7a0aa4b4811d6731343ced1d58e9a888c59a79a2.headline: At Least 39 Dead in High Speed Train Collision in Southern Spain

3afb5e468f2f5d81f0abf39b4ca30a5aeaf9a8cc.summary: Guatemala's president has declared a 30-day nationwide state of emergency following a surge in gang violence, including the killing of eight police officers and the taking of 46 hostages at three prisons. The measure allows police to arrest suspected criminals without judicial order.
3afb5e468f2f5d81f0abf39b4ca30a5aeaf9a8cc.headline: Guatemala Declares 30 Day State of Emergency Amid Gang Violence

95eadbe6d5f1771f45a2e61f5b3126a5439e3638.summary: The Buffalo Bills fired head coach Sean McDermott after nine seasons, following a playoff defeat to the Denver Broncos and repeated failures to reach the Super Bowl. Brandon Beane was promoted to president. The team will search for a new head coach for the next NFL season.
95eadbe6d5f1771f45a2e61f5b3126a5439e3638.headline: Buffalo Bills Fire Coach Sean McDermott After Nine Seasons

61002e5288d82ae4c46f93cfb25ef87646a0dcc8.summary: With the 2025 college football season concluded, analysts are previewing the 2026 season and ranking top teams, including national champion Indiana, in early projections.
61002e5288d82ae4c46f93cfb25ef87646a0dcc8.headline: Analysts Release Early 2026 College Football Rankings After Indianas

75c16ec5c57d6ab5fc9dc9a8cf1f5733b97d8642.summary: Donald Trump threatened 200% tariffs on French wines to pressure Emmanuel Macron to join his proposed 'Board of Peace' initiative at Davos. Macron declined the invitation, and the tariff threat led to a drop in European stocks and sell-offs by French drinks companies.
75c16ec5c57d6ab5fc9dc9a8cf1f5733b97d8642.headline: Trump Threatens Tariffs on French Wine After Macron Declines Peace

7f6f7a8308f9ff4f54699dad41757788823b9c86.summary: Victor Manuel Diaz, a 36-year-old from Nicaragua, died of a presumed suicide on January 14 at the Camp East Montana immigration detention facility in El Paso, Texas, according to ICE. He is the second detainee to die at a Texas immigration facility in two weeks.
7f6f7a8308f9ff4f54699dad41757788823b9c86.headline: Second Detainee Dies in Two Weeks at Texas Immigration Facility

aa50c3eb34eca9e332e6ef345ac0504f56e643b5.summary: Investigators examining Sunday's high-speed train derailment in Spain, which resulted in at least 40 deaths, have identified a broken joint on the rails as a possible cause, according to a source familiar with the initial findings.
aa50c3eb34eca9e332e6ef345ac0504f56e643b5.headline: Broken Rail Joint Found at Site of Fatal Spain Train Derailment

3f7d269a7cde32d863eba759b418fa5db62712bc.summary: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell plans to attend the Supreme Court hearing in the Cook case. His attendance comes amid a federal criminal investigation into the central bank's renovation project and follows previous criticism from the Trump administration.
3f7d269a7cde32d863eba759b418fa5db62712bc.headline: Fed Chair Powell to Attend Supreme Court Hearing in Cook Case

6506297479bfae221b99dbb833949502df6a064d.summary: Hackers disrupted Iranian state TV broadcasts to show footage supporting the exiled crown prince and urging security forces not to target civilians. The incident follows ongoing nationwide protests, with reported deaths from the crackdown exceeding 4,000.
6506297479bfae221b99dbb833949502df6a064d.headline: Hackers Interrupt Iran State TV With Message Backing Exiled Prince

ab4cc5d530cb5a44a719fcac16fd4c4a780aa26c.summary: Official data shows private sector wage growth in the UK has slowed to its lowest rate in five years. Employment has declined, especially in shops, restaurants, bars, and hotels, while the unemployment rate remains at 5.1%.
ab4cc5d530cb5a44a719fcac16fd4c4a780aa26c.headline: UK Private Sector Wage Growth Falls to Five Year Low as Employment

642863a1b6981b186b611f50ad298c063fd2f530.summary: A snowstorm in Ottawa County, Michigan caused a 100-vehicle pileup, leaving jack-knifed trucks across the road. Forecasters warn of extremely cold temperatures and more winter storms expected in several states.
642863a1b6981b186b611f50ad298c063fd2f530.headline: 100 Vehicle Pileup in Michigan as Snowstorm Sweeps Across States

674280996858ff776acb31a3ad2ca89597f9774e.summary: Russian drone and missile attacks on Kyiv have left thousands of buildings without heating and other basic services during freezing weather. The strikes occurred overnight, affecting many residents in the Ukrainian capital.
674280996858ff776acb31a3ad2ca89597f9774e.headline: Russian Strikes Leave Thousands in Kyiv Without Heat Amid Cold

908fbcaf8eab4d9d3629bdf543bd44093727269a.summary: Elon Musk posted a poll on X asking if he should buy Ryanair, amid an ongoing dispute with Ryanair CEO Michael O’Leary related to Starlink services.
908fbcaf8eab4d9d3629bdf543bd44093727269a.headline: Elon Musk Polls X Users on Potential Ryanair Purchase Amid Dispute

df6fcc7feafb21f36d65ff238da133e6bb82230d.summary: Valentino, renowned Italian fashion designer and founder of the Valentino luxury brand, has died at age 93. He was known for his signature red designs and dressed royalty, celebrities, and first ladies. Tributes have been shared by figures including Gwyneth Paltrow.
df6fcc7feafb21f36d65ff238da133e6bb82230d.headline: Italian Fashion Designer Valentino Dies at 93

d4e6ef1d4e3e6b975435006aa127a43fa7b60804.summary: Tensions have escalated between the US and Europe after Trump reiterated demands regarding Greenland, prompting European officials to respond and some Danish officials to skip Davos. European stocks and the dollar fell amid concerns over US-European friction, while leaders called for calm and mediation.
d4e6ef1d4e3e6b975435006aa127a43fa7b60804.headline: US European Tensions Over Greenland Lead to Market Declines and

dfec801d67965dd0f1deb8b4b99ea7d064d2bbed.summary: Global stock markets declined and the dollar weakened as concerns over fallout from Trump's actions related to Greenland drove investors toward gold.
dfec801d67965dd0f1deb8b4b99ea7d064d2bbed.headline: Stocks Drop and Gold Rises Amid Uncertainty Over Trumps Greenland

506e951c0c4aae35aceabfe4e6a9760fc26e26a2.summary: President Trump has launched a 'Board of Peace' focused on Gaza, inviting leaders from multiple countries, including China, Russia, Israel, and France. Norway declined to participate, while the UAE and Belarus accepted. France has not joined, despite Trump threatening tariffs on French goods. The board's purpose and structure remain unclear as invitations continue.
506e951c0c4aae35aceabfe4e6a9760fc26e26a2.headline: Trump Launches Board of Peace With Mixed Global Response

21061a693c8b971de2100264d17eccc2f1bf8c9e.summary: Israeli crews demolished buildings inside the UNRWA compound in East Jerusalem on Tuesday, following Israel's seizure of the site last year. The United Nations agency for Palestinian refugees condemned the demolition as a violation of international law. Teargas was also fired at a UN vocational school in Qalandia in the West Bank.
21061a693c8b971de2100264d17eccc2f1bf8c9e.headline: Israel Demolishes UNRWA Compound Buildings in East Jerusalem

a368c1e069ac8c9dc95b7647b14d3f0d865de449.summary: Golden State Warriors forward Jimmy Butler will miss the rest of the NBA season after suffering a torn right ACL during a game against the Miami Heat. The injury occurred in the third quarter following a collision with Miami's Davion Mitchell. Butler will be sidelined for the remainder of the season, according to his agent.
a368c1e069ac8c9dc95b7647b14d3f0d865de449.headline: Warriors Jimmy Butler Out for Season With Torn Right ACL

08a7dc5e66a33765f6d2a454b5b4eb1d96fc683f.summary: At least 39 people were killed in a train crash in Andalucía, Spain, making it the country's deadliest rail accident since 2013. Authorities have imposed a speed limit on the Madrid-Barcelona line as investigators continue to search for the cause. Victims included a police officer, journalists, and a family. A local lottery ticket seller aided rescue efforts using his quad bike.
08a7dc5e66a33765f6d2a454b5b4eb1d96fc683f.headline: Spain Imposes Speed Limit After Andalucía Train Crash Kills 39

8cbdcc0dd9f0a2c615d32b474b860e786767e7d1.summary: The UK government has approved China's plan to build a large new embassy near the Tower of London, despite concerns from critics about potential security risks. Local residents and opponents are expected to challenge the decision through legal means.
8cbdcc0dd9f0a2c615d32b474b860e786767e7d1.headline: UK Government Approves New Chinese Embassy Near Tower of London

125970357a867ac5c36766f81fd4e47ca1faff0e.summary: The Duke of Sussex is scheduled to give evidence in his case against Associated Newspapers, accusing the publisher of phone hacking and other unlawful information gathering. The publisher defends its actions by citing legitimate sourcing, while the duke claims he has faced a campaign of attacks. The case is being heard in the high court.
125970357a867ac5c36766f81fd4e47ca1faff0e.headline: Duke of Sussex to Testify in High Court Case Against Associated

634c459f414b2d65defed19e223343cb66f8fa19.summary: European leaders, including Emmanuel Macron, have criticized Donald Trump's threats to impose tariffs over Greenland, following leaked texts and AI mock-ups shared by Trump. EU officials warn that relations may not recover, as tensions rise over the US stance on the Arctic island.
634c459f414b2d65defed19e223343cb66f8fa19.headline: European Leaders Condemn Trumps Tariff Threats Over Greenland

bc6e1fb579cc50577d6d33beeac982549975633f.summary: Netflix has amended its offer to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery's studio and streaming assets, making its $72 billion bid entirely in cash at $27.75 per share. The move aims to strengthen Netflix's position against a competing bid from Paramount Skydance.
bc6e1fb579cc50577d6d33beeac982549975633f.headline: Netflix Makes $72 Billion All Cash Bid for Warner Bros. Discovery

2cdeea11ec76433613f2f5b3b78290f7866be881.summary: EU chief Ursula von der Leyen criticized Donald Trump's proposed tariffs on Greenland and questioned his trustworthiness. The issue has become a major topic at the World Economic Forum in Davos, with discussions focused on tensions between the U.S. and its NATO allies over Greenland.
2cdeea11ec76433613f2f5b3b78290f7866be881.headline: EU Criticizes Trumps Greenland Tariffs at World Economic Forum

9710de999059ceffa39796c14e59e5975b7ad242.summary: Justin Trudeau and pop star Katy Perry appeared together at the World Economic Forum in Davos, where Trudeau delivered a speech promoting soft power and non-interference in other countries' domestic policies.
9710de999059ceffa39796c14e59e5975b7ad242.headline: Trudeau and Katy Perry Appear Together at Davos Forum

17241da13f62b2e26d4c08e7cfab176bbf77f316.summary: NCAA men's golf champion Michael La Sasso has signed with Phil Mickelson's HyFlyers team in LIV Golf, which means he will not participate in the 2026 Masters tournament.
17241da13f62b2e26d4c08e7cfab176bbf77f316.headline: NCAA Champion Michael La Sasso Joins LIV Golf

a997e38b7e29572aab44ca5f1ec41e1903417572.summary: A Florida state attorney has dismissed the misdemeanor trespassing charge against Vikings receiver Jordan Addison following his arrest in Tampa on January 12, according to court records.
a997e38b7e29572aab44ca5f1ec41e1903417572.headline: Trespassing Charge Against Jordan Addison Dismissed in Florida

00d7358535c5462d827c40afdcd5eceeba496521.summary: Indiana finished the season undefeated and was ranked No. 1 in the final AP Top 25 college football poll after defeating Miami to win the College Football Playoff National Championship.
00d7358535c5462d827c40afdcd5eceeba496521.headline: Indiana Ranked No. 1 After Winning College Football Playoff Title

70a4756b02c147bec59688cf6ddc71949dc48543.summary: The NBA announced the 2026 Finals schedule, with Game 1 set for June 3 and a possible Game 7 on June 19. All games will start at 8:30 p.m. ET / 5:30 p.m. PT. The new timeline could result in a longer gap between the Finals and the NBA Draft.
70a4756b02c147bec59688cf6ddc71949dc48543.headline: NBA Sets 2026 Finals Schedule With Game 1 on June 3

d7d4c9c8ef5a3653a7a725096920e0645a760cf5.summary: Naomi Osaka advanced to the second round of the Australian Open after defeating Antonia Ruzic in a hard-fought first-round match, drawing attention for her jellyfish-inspired walk-on outfit.
d7d4c9c8ef5a3653a7a725096920e0645a760cf5.headline: Naomi Osaka Wins Australian Open Opener in Notable Outfit

d312731ab36e736d963ab1303275fd0b199e8bb8.summary: The Tennessee Titans are finalizing an agreement to hire Robert Saleh as their next head coach after two consecutive 3-14 seasons, aiming to improve the team's performance.
d312731ab36e736d963ab1303275fd0b199e8bb8.headline: Titans Finalizing Deal to Hire Robert Saleh as Head Coach

30d86f82266213247e6b1df5cb3cc7a60f908f97.summary: Danish pension fund AkademikerPension has announced it will divest its holdings in U.S. Treasuries, citing rising tensions between Denmark and the U.S. over Greenland. The decision has drawn criticism from some financial analysts.
30d86f82266213247e6b1df5cb3cc7a60f908f97.headline: AkademikerPension to Divest U.S. Treasuries Amid Denmark U.S. Tensions

9a63371c7222a6f09576afbef11039b199b027c5.summary: Kurdish-led forces in Syria have withdrawn from the al-Hol detention camp, which houses tens of thousands of Islamic State-linked detainees, after the US announced it no longer supports the group. The withdrawal comes as the forces lose territory to government troops.
9a63371c7222a6f09576afbef11039b199b027c5.headline: Kurdish Forces Withdraw From al Hol Camp After US Ends Support

fff7741c8b3f39cf17cbf23764753b1ad125f24f.summary: A UN report released today declares that the world has entered an era of 'global water bankruptcy,' with billions affected by chronic groundwater depletion, pollution, and overuse. The report calls for urgent action from world leaders to address water mismanagement and adapt to worsening conditions.
fff7741c8b3f39cf17cbf23764753b1ad125f24f.headline: UN Report Warns Billions Face Global Water Bankruptcy

3061089e97ffcee1ca3a2d0917bd4a22ca407fdc.summary: Club Brugge defeated Kairat 4-1 away in a Champions League match. Inter Milan is set to play Arsenal tonight, with both teams preparing for the game under the new Champions League format. Inter Milan president Beppe Marotta discussed the format changes ahead of the match.
3061089e97ffcee1ca3a2d0917bd4a22ca407fdc.headline: Club Brugge Wins 4 1

5419755ebf86215be7c2e5e6b05001007ba27bee.summary: Elon Musk and Ryanair CEO Michael O'Leary have exchanged insults online after O'Leary rejected installing Starlink internet on Ryanair planes. Musk has publicly suggested he wants to buy the airline, intensifying the dispute.
5419755ebf86215be7c2e5e6b05001007ba27bee.headline: Elon Musk and Ryanair CEO OLeary Trade Insults Over Starlink Dispute

3c7867332ed180e693ddc657caf393740b711e36.summary: Indiana University football won the national championship by defeating Miami, completing a perfect season. The Hoosiers, previously considered one of the worst teams, secured the title after a closely contested game on Monday night.
3c7867332ed180e693ddc657caf393740b711e36.headline: Indiana University Wins Football National Championship Over Miami

aa9709394dc7b06f2855ec382126b7dfdaf8dbcd.summary: Brooklyn Peltz Beckham announced he has cut ties with his family, alleging on Instagram that his mother, Victoria, acted inappropriately at his wedding and that his parents tried to control public narratives about his relationship with his wife, Nicola.
aa9709394dc7b06f2855ec382126b7dfdaf8dbcd.headline: Brooklyn Peltz Beckham Says He Has Cut Ties With Family

2a457de4f81a52afdb5ef49f55eab7bc04ea67a7.summary: Lucy Letby, serving 15 whole-life prison terms for the murder of seven babies and the attempted murder of seven others, will face no new charges, prosecutors announced.
2a457de4f81a52afdb5ef49f55eab7bc04ea67a7.headline: No New Charges for Lucy Letby

4324b691daa17bca59f2bf24908c2fefc2789253.summary: A six-year-old girl is the only member of her family to survive a train collision in southern Spain that killed 42 people. She had traveled to Madrid with her parents, brother, and cousin to see a musical and was returning home when the accident occurred.
4324b691daa17bca59f2bf24908c2fefc2789253.headline: Six Year Old Survives Spanish Train Crash That Killed 42

d92fbcc6a3fcb7e5c34fe2d2e90a51ae3f719fe9.summary: Federal grand jury subpoenas were issued on Tuesday to Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey, Kahly Her, Keith Ellison, and Mary Moriarty. The subpoenas were served as part of a federal government investigation.
d92fbcc6a3fcb7e5c34fe2d2e90a51ae3f719fe9.headline: Federal Grand Jury Subpoenas Issued to Minnesota Officials

c4dea28a621cb97e3d712844eeabc854e7dde37f.summary: Carlos Beltrán and Andruw Jones have been elected to the National Baseball Hall of Fame by the Baseball Writers Association of America. They will be inducted in Cooperstown on July 26, 2026, alongside Jeff Kent. Beltrán received 84.2% of the vote in his fourth year on the ballot. The Hall of Fame Class of 2026 includes three players.
c4dea28a621cb97e3d712844eeabc854e7dde37f.headline: Beltrán Jones and Kent Elected to Baseball Hall of Fame Class of

35907068d4e6105bd042443dcd5683d31b46d172.summary: Donald Trump's flight to Davos for the World Economic Forum was delayed after Air Force One experienced a minor electrical issue and returned to Joint Base Andrews. Trump then boarded another aircraft and resumed his trip to Switzerland. The incident caused a brief interruption, but the journey continued as planned.
35907068d4e6105bd042443dcd5683d31b46d172.headline: Trump Resumes Davos Trip After Air Force One Electrical Issue

9c68d09be1f082644cd50f1af3a56f7f9f4679fa.summary: A Japanese court sentenced Tetsuya Yamagami to life in prison for the assassination of former prime minister Shinzo Abe in 2022. Yamagami admitted to shooting Abe with a homemade gun during a political rally in Nara, an event that shocked Japan due to its rarity of gun violence.
9c68d09be1f082644cd50f1af3a56f7f9f4679fa.headline: Abes Assassin Sentenced to Life in Prison by Japanese Court

5ad7f439da61716ea79ac3a99b82d4cb684d6840.summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has accepted an invitation to join Donald Trump's Board of Peace. The announcement comes amid ongoing conflict in Gaza and international scrutiny over Netanyahu's actions.
5ad7f439da61716ea79ac3a99b82d4cb684d6840.headline: Netanyahu Accepts Invitation to Join Trumps Board of Peace

23fcd20d570fd80c2d0c82a9387dcd754fb47e41.summary: Emma Raducanu was eliminated from the Australian Open in the second round after losing in straight sets to Anastasia Potapova. Meanwhile, Carlos Alcaraz, Aryna Sabalenka, Zeynep Sonmez, and Victoria Mboko advanced to the third round with straight-set victories.
23fcd20d570fd80c2d0c82a9387dcd754fb47e41.headline: Raducanu Exits Australian Open as Alcaraz

404a0ec03b706e95da4811aae4218679cc51db59.summary: The U.S. military seized a seventh oil tanker linked to Venezuela in the Caribbean on Tuesday, as part of ongoing efforts to control Venezuelan oil shipments following recent actions against the country.
404a0ec03b706e95da4811aae4218679cc51db59.headline: U.S. Military Seizes Seventh Venezuela Linked Oil Tanker in Caribbean

8b9a5a28f22215c47615adf17f13d870a9f1a921.summary: Israeli crews have demolished structures at the UNRWA compound in east Jerusalem and fired teargas at a UN vocational school in Qalandia, escalating actions against the United Nations agency for Palestinian refugees.
8b9a5a28f22215c47615adf17f13d870a9f1a921.headline: Israeli Crews Demolish UNRWA Compound

9aacb01a9b287958ae9de6177e8e30c449cd6dcc.summary: The Los Angeles Chargers are expected to hire former Miami Dolphins head coach Mike McDaniel as their new offensive coordinator. While no deal has been officially signed, multiple sources report McDaniel is likely to join the Chargers and work with quarterback Justin Herbert. An official announcement is pending.
9aacb01a9b287958ae9de6177e8e30c449cd6dcc.headline: Chargers Expected to Hire Mike McDaniel as Offensive Coordinator

2f60abbb7786e20db0bddea0bb6daf7d3adf170f.summary: Baker Mayfield, now quarterback for the Buccaneers, commented on facing new Falcons coach Kevin Stefanski, referencing their difficult split in Cleveland. Mayfield said, "Can't wait to see you twice a year, Coach," as both are set to compete in the NFC South during the 2026 NFL season.
2f60abbb7786e20db0bddea0bb6daf7d3adf170f.headline: Mayfield Anticipates NFC South Matchups Against Falcons Coach

000e14a24901b4b78f7a72d33ea9ba573dea9021.summary: UK inflation rose to 3.4% in December 2025, exceeding economists' forecasts of 3.3%. The increase, driven by higher airfares, tobacco, and food prices, marks the first rise in five months. The Bank of England expects this uptick to be temporary and will consider the data at its upcoming interest rate decision on 5 February 2026.
000e14a24901b4b78f7a72d33ea9ba573dea9021.headline: UK Inflation Rises to 3.4% in December

1e349fadacbe01da69c6f2b8f5ed96251996a3a6.summary: Mexico has extradited 37 additional cartel suspects to the US. Security Minister Omar Garcia Harfuch stated that the US has promised not to seek the death penalty for these individuals. The move comes as Mexico increases efforts against cartels amid US threats of airstrikes.
1e349fadacbe01da69c6f2b8f5ed96251996a3a6.headline: Mexico Extradites 37 Cartel Suspects to US After Death Penalty

191b0da34ec1bbdd4175554e0aaed3cb217ea584.summary: President Trump has established a new international organization called the Board of Peace, inviting multiple countries to join. The initiative has drawn criticism from some who argue it could undermine the United Nations. The UN Security Council endorsed the group, though concerns remain about its purpose and impact.
191b0da34ec1bbdd4175554e0aaed3cb217ea584.headline: Trump Launches Board of Peace

169efbdfc5919893b6079ab6b92b05df640a447e.summary: Bo Bichette has signed with the New York Mets after nearly reaching a deal with the Philadelphia Phillies. Phillies president Dave Dombrowski expressed disappointment over missing out on Bichette, who chose the Mets last week despite strong interest from Philadelphia.
169efbdfc5919893b6079ab6b92b05df640a447e.headline: Bo Bichette Signs With Mets After Near Deal With Phillies

dfa7b27df65b18514c131a40e38ac1bbd0cf4ace.summary: A commuter train near Barcelona crashed after hitting a collapsed retaining wall, killing the driver and injuring at least 37 people, including four seriously, according to firefighters. The incident follows a recent fatal train collision in Andalucía.
dfa7b27df65b18514c131a40e38ac1bbd0cf4ace.headline: Commuter Train Crash Near Barcelona Kills Driver

628a5bd6fda0279ec88c07b0ef5fecf5e1c6d47e.summary: The New York Mets acquired center fielder Luis Robert Jr. from the Chicago White Sox in a trade on Tuesday, sending infielder Luisangel Acuña and pitcher Truman Pauley to Chicago. Robert, an All-Star and Silver Slugger winner in 2023, fills a key outfield need for the Mets.
628a5bd6fda0279ec88c07b0ef5fecf5e1c6d47e.headline: Mets Acquire Luis Robert Jr. From White Sox in Trade

e9affbea20654e32fcf9d19cbce9de1dee027498.summary: Han Duck-soo has been sentenced to 23 years in prison after being convicted of involvement in the imposition of martial law under former President Yoon Suk Yeol. The court ruled that the action constituted an insurrection.
e9affbea20654e32fcf9d19cbce9de1dee027498.headline: Han Duck soo Sentenced to 23 Years for Role in Martial Law

254467d208dcc9b7cc67eefdf34675961243920d.summary: A train derailed in Barcelona, resulting in one death and 37 injuries, including five serious cases. The incident occurred two days after a train collision in Andalusia that killed 42 people. Spain is observing three days of mourning for the victims of the earlier crash.
254467d208dcc9b7cc67eefdf34675961243920d.headline: Barcelona Train Derailment Kills 1

17e9742f0f9a5513da7d855fb7daa75803a29d0f.summary: Trump has signed an order restricting institutional and Wall Street investors from buying single-family homes. The order exempts build-to-rent properties that were originally developed as rental communities.
17e9742f0f9a5513da7d855fb7daa75803a29d0f.headline: Trump Signs Order Restricting Institutional Purchases of Single

6a363a38ca41c02530e18bcda1dca7d6d2cd8566.summary: Charles Bediako, who went undrafted in the 2023 NBA draft and has since played for three G League teams, has filed a lawsuit against the NCAA seeking reinstatement to join the Crimson Tide.
6a363a38ca41c02530e18bcda1dca7d6d2cd8566.headline: Charles Bediako Sues NCAA to Rejoin Crimson Tide

835029feadc6886b1e2db78d592ad6b56fea9ba8.summary: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy stated that prices are rising as businesses run out of goods imported before the Trump tariffs. With limited inventory remaining, some retailers have begun increasing prices to offset the impact of the tariffs.
835029feadc6886b1e2db78d592ad6b56fea9ba8.headline: Amazon CEO Says Trump Tariffs Lead to Rising Prices as Stockpiles

67d8c28fe66d4f16facf4d18e3df1ee350d612e6.summary: Brooklyn Beckham has publicly accused his parents, David and Victoria Beckham, of prioritizing their public image over family and attempting to undermine his marriage. The allegations were made in a series of social media posts, bringing the family's internal conflict into the public eye.
67d8c28fe66d4f16facf4d18e3df1ee350d612e6.headline: Brooklyn Beckham Accuses Parents of Undermining His Marriage

fe990c6946d1df3d75b2f454b1fd9893cf230c9a.summary: Coby White led the Chicago Bulls to a 138-110 win over the Los Angeles Clippers. The Winnipeg Jets beat the St. Louis Blues 3-1 with two goals from Mark Scheifele. The Phoenix Suns topped the Philadelphia 76ers 116-110. The Houston Rockets rallied to defeat the San Antonio Spurs 111-106. The Los Angeles Lakers overcame the Denver Nuggets 115-107, and the Toronto Raptors beat the Golden State Warriors 145-127.
fe990c6946d1df3d75b2f454b1fd9893cf230c9a.headline: Bulls Lakers Raptors and Suns Secure NBA Wins

cb87251d0b43dfc028214d3e71bf2ab75fa26379.summary: Donald Trump declined to clarify his plans regarding a potential Greenland takeover, stating 'you'll find out' when questioned. He also did not reassure about his commitment to NATO's stability ahead of meetings with world leaders at the World Economic Forum in Davos.
cb87251d0b43dfc028214d3e71bf2ab75fa26379.headline: Trump Declines to Clarify Greenland Plans Ahead of Davos Meetings

3d21ef26be9827205f9b70677ec1238605da71ab.summary: NASA astronaut Suni Williams retired on December 27, 2025, after 27 years of service and three missions aboard the International Space Station. Williams set multiple human spaceflight records during her career.
3d21ef26be9827205f9b70677ec1238605da71ab.headline: NASA Astronaut Suni Williams Retires After 27 Years and Three ISS

3ca770aede47b3daa1bdf119dfcfc103996159ce.summary: Buster Posey has been selected for induction into the 2026 Baseball Hall of Fame. Other notable new candidates, including Jon Lester, Brett Gardner, Kyle Seager, and Ryan Zimmerman, were not chosen for induction this year.
3ca770aede47b3daa1bdf119dfcfc103996159ce.headline: Buster Posey Inducted Into 2026 Baseball Hall of Fame

b6abc0cdd56760e09ff62cc06d350ce821f32aa8.summary: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent stated at the World Economic Forum that Denmark's investment in U.S. Treasury bonds is 'irrelevant' and expressed no concern over a potential Treasury sell-off related to Greenland.
b6abc0cdd56760e09ff62cc06d350ce821f32aa8.headline: U.S. Treasury Secretary Dismisses Danish Bond Sell Off Concerns

dbf36c64055ff9bff1a3e77ecc534a03b7018ef7.summary: A UN report warns that the world is facing 'global water bankruptcy,' with overuse and pollution threatening water supplies for billions of people. The report calls for urgent action to address these issues to prevent further harm and potential system collapse.
dbf36c64055ff9bff1a3e77ecc534a03b7018ef7.headline: UN Warns Billions at Risk from Global Water Overuse and Pollution

9025b01cb837d347e908b8cb0b506a36dbc61e2c.summary: Syria has announced a ceasefire with Kurdish forces in the northeast, giving them four days to agree to integration into the central state. The United States, their main ally, has urged the Kurdish forces to accept the offer and signaled an end to military support.
9025b01cb837d347e908b8cb0b506a36dbc61e2c.headline: Syria Announces Ceasefire Urges Kurdish Forces to Integrate

3c0202a070818749bb8a76497b13115088b8fe6e.summary: At the World Economic Forum in Davos, Donald Trump renewed his call for immediate negotiations to acquire Greenland, stating the US would not use military force. British Prime Minister Keir Starmer publicly rejected Trump's pressure regarding Greenland, issuing his strongest rebuke yet. Trump also threatened tariffs on several European nations in relation to the dispute.
3c0202a070818749bb8a76497b13115088b8fe6e.headline: Trump Calls for Greenland Talks

ff9f9e1525d38279891b40670825ec00982bb15d.summary: The US Supreme Court heard arguments on the Trump administration's effort to fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook. Justices appeared skeptical of granting this authority, raising concerns about central bank independence. After the hearing, Cook's position appears secure, with the Court showing reluctance to support her removal.
ff9f9e1525d38279891b40670825ec00982bb15d.headline: Supreme Court Signals Reluctance to Allow Firing of Feds Lisa Cook

3dafbcef4f8d55e8f0951d13be02dd90101a1be5.summary: Donald Trump announced he will not impose tariffs on eight European nations over their support for Greenland, citing a 'framework' deal reached with NATO. The tariffs, previously scheduled for February 1, have been canceled following a meeting with NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte.
3dafbcef4f8d55e8f0951d13be02dd90101a1be5.headline: Trump Cancels Tariffs After Reaching Greenland Deal Framework With

2f4ede031d977b56264ac25803f986585df75364.summary: Israeli fire killed 11 Palestinians in Gaza on Wednesday, including three journalists and two 13-year-old boys, according to local medics. The journalists, who were documenting a new camp and working for a committee overseeing Egyptian aid, were killed when an Israeli air strike targeted their car near Al-Zahra. The incidents occurred amid ongoing violence despite a three-month-old ceasefire.
2f4ede031d977b56264ac25803f986585df75364.headline: Israeli Fire Kills 11 in Gaza

c18f32bd284f6ac0246ef362debf10266a4b3c9c.summary: Several countries have agreed to join President Trump's newly formed Board of Peace ahead of a signing ceremony scheduled for Thursday, while many others have not yet joined. The organization has drawn criticism from some who say it could undermine the United Nations.
c18f32bd284f6ac0246ef362debf10266a4b3c9c.headline: Several Nations Join Trumps Board of Peace Ahead of Signing Ceremony

06e3c7119a50273e69af12bda9aac919bdd71a94.summary: Seven Muslim-majority countries, along with Albania, Bahrain, Hungary, Morocco, and Israel, have joined Trump's 'Board of Peace,' which aims to support Gaza Strip reconstruction and promote a just and lasting peace. Pope Leo has been invited to join, according to a cardinal.
06e3c7119a50273e69af12bda9aac919bdd71a94.headline: Trumps Board of Peace Gains Support From Multiple Nations

8844123a69bceee8830e06f22aadca616690a588.summary: EU lawmakers have suspended the ratification of a US trade deal in response to Donald Trump's threats of tariffs over Greenland. Separately, the EU-Mercosur trade agreement has been referred to the Court of Justice of the EU to assess its compatibility with EU policy. An emergency summit is planned to discuss possible responses.
8844123a69bceee8830e06f22aadca616690a588.headline: EU Suspends US Trade Deal and Refers Mercosur Pact to Top Court

5868e36a65c27ae9ea74d6f63c3e92053c25bb9e.summary: Rifaat al-Assad, known as the 'Butcher of Hama' and a former Syrian vice president, has died in exile at the age of 88. He was the uncle of Bashar al-Assad.
5868e36a65c27ae9ea74d6f63c3e92053c25bb9e.headline: Rifaat al Assad Former Syrian Vice President Dies at 88

86b067ed2d94d2bd93d9b3836ac5c70ad79ac191.summary: The US military has begun transferring Islamic State detainees from prisons in northeast Syria to Iraq. So far, 150 detainees have been moved, with up to 7,000 potentially to be relocated under the program. The transfer follows a recent jail break and advances by Syrian government forces into areas previously controlled by US partners.
86b067ed2d94d2bd93d9b3836ac5c70ad79ac191.headline: US Begins Moving Islamic State Detainees From Syria to Iraq

6cfde93eb41a55c6878ee03e1d7e69cdb1783b2d.summary: A Japanese court sentenced Tetsuya Yamagami to life in prison for assassinating former prime minister Shinzo Abe in 2022 while Abe was giving a campaign speech in Nara. Yamagami admitted to the shooting and pleaded guilty. The case shocked Japan and drew widespread attention due to the rarity of gun violence in the country.
6cfde93eb41a55c6878ee03e1d7e69cdb1783b2d.headline: Shinzo Abes Assassin Sentenced to Life in Prison in Japan

e5fb99275b2eeecd08edeb81af91787e1055365a.summary: US envoy Steve Witkoff announced he will meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday to discuss land deals related to Ukraine.
e5fb99275b2eeecd08edeb81af91787e1055365a.headline: US Envoy Witkoff to Meet Putin Thursday on Ukraine Land Deals

07cfbfabc13db058b24d0844c0baede868e60f2c.summary: Manchester City's players will refund ticket costs for 374 supporters who traveled to Norway to watch the team's 3-1 Champions League defeat to Bodo/Glimt. The decision follows the team's unexpected loss, with Erling Haaland apologizing for the performance.
07cfbfabc13db058b24d0844c0baede868e60f2c.headline: Manchester City to Refund Fans After Loss to Bodo/Glimt

b79366d631c615d968af3e808e775efd2449b00f.summary: The New York Mets have acquired Luis Robert Jr. from the Chicago White Sox in exchange for Luisangel Acuña and pitching prospect Truman Pauley. Robert Jr. is a former Gold Glove winner and hit 38 home runs two seasons ago.
b79366d631c615d968af3e808e775efd2449b00f.headline: Mets Acquire Luis Robert Jr. From White Sox for Acuña and Pauley

5f287e83003f597dee0597bff8cbac1a04463349.summary: Carlos Beltran and Andruw Jones have been voted into the Baseball Hall of Fame, recognizing their achievements as standout center fielders.
5f287e83003f597dee0597bff8cbac1a04463349.headline: Carlos Beltran and Andruw Jones Elected to Baseball Hall of Fame

9f2516efb224ac4dec163ffcdb0406ff0274a5a9.summary: Buffalo Bills owner Terry Pegula stated that the team's coaching staff, led by Sean McDermott, advocated for drafting Keon Coleman. Pegula's comments come after the team's playoff loss and amid criticism of the organization's decision-making.
9f2516efb224ac4dec163ffcdb0406ff0274a5a9.headline: Bills Owner Says Coaching Staff Drove Keon Coleman Draft Decision

eca3c0d39e056b4571a0c797e1583c847e91fade.summary: Donald Trump has withdrawn his threat to impose tariffs related to Greenland after a meeting with NATO's Mark Rutte. The announcement led to gold prices reaching a new record high of over $4,800, following earlier market volatility driven by the tariff concerns.
eca3c0d39e056b4571a0c797e1583c847e91fade.headline: Trump Drops Greenland Tariff Threat After Meeting

572f472e2d7422eeac132190515dd8e7b32927de.summary: Trump stated at Davos that 'Canada lives because of the United States' in response to remarks from Carney that criticized U.S. policies. The exchange drew attention at the international event.
572f472e2d7422eeac132190515dd8e7b32927de.headline: Trump Says Canada Lives Because of the US After Carney Criticism

839c6af4dbbe9999e706c968464b178e8a9d94d7.summary: Prince Harry testified at London's High Court in his privacy lawsuit against the publisher of the Daily Mail, alleging unlawful information gathering and serious breaches of privacy. He stated the publisher made his wife Meghan's life 'an absolute misery.' Other public figures have joined the legal action. The case is ongoing.
839c6af4dbbe9999e706c968464b178e8a9d94d7.headline: Prince Harry Testifies in Ongoing Privacy Lawsuit Against Daily Mail

853752437b7d2e079c97f750feabc8be7d0349c4.summary: Cody Bellinger has re-signed with the New York Yankees on a five-year, $162.5 million contract after opting out of his previous deal following the 2025 season. The agreement, reported on January 21, 2026, secures one of the Yankees' top hitters for the coming years.
853752437b7d2e079c97f750feabc8be7d0349c4.headline: Cody Bellinger Re Signs With Yankees on Five Year

88d31d61361baf53fb599992b070876b41b1d47a.summary: Spanish train drivers have called for a strike following a major derailment in southern Spain that killed at least 43 people and injured dozens. The union criticized ongoing deterioration of the railway system in response to the deadly crash.
88d31d61361baf53fb599992b070876b41b1d47a.headline: Spanish Train Drivers Announce Strike After Fatal Derailment

c80a2c2c0843c96df951c08239735dd791cc9f63.summary: Lord Nash has proposed raising the age limit in a draft law on social media use, currently under consideration in Parliament. The government plans to consult on the policy by summer. Kemi Badenoch and other Conservative figures urge Keir Starmer to implement a ban on social media for under-16s, citing concerns about children's mental health.
c80a2c2c0843c96df951c08239735dd791cc9f63.headline: Parliament Debates Raising Social Media Age Limit as Conservatives

931a15579a6ec3e61512a0220cce020b959a1ad0.summary: Team owner Terry Pegula stated that the decision to draft Keon Coleman was made by Sean McDermott's coaching staff, not by general manager Brandon Beane or the front office. Pegula made these comments at a press conference with Beane, clarifying responsibility for the draft pick.
931a15579a6ec3e61512a0220cce020b959a1ad0.headline: Pegula Says McDermotts Staff Responsible for Keon Coleman Draft Pick

f10f70ebbd6f20713ef3c2678f69231580f4bd50.summary: The Welsh Rugby Union has been criticized in parliament for plans to cut a professional team, with warnings that it is out of touch with fans.
f10f70ebbd6f20713ef3c2678f69231580f4bd50.headline: Welsh Rugby Union Criticized in Parliament Over Team Cut Plans

08009f6a14284d448d6a0e6ef1afed519a2de89f.summary: Buffalo Bills owner Terry Pegula fired coach Sean McDermott after the team's overtime loss to the Denver Broncos, citing the team's inability to advance in the playoffs as the main reason for the decision. Pegula said he made the decision in the locker room following the defeat.
08009f6a14284d448d6a0e6ef1afed519a2de89f.headline: Bills Owner Terry Pegula Fires Coach Sean McDermott After Playoff Loss

9094c11b42d9eb1b0321f81c4b4f7cb22cbe1352.summary: Olivia Dean and Lola Young each received five nominations for the 2026 Brit Awards, leading the shortlist. Pulp earned their first nomination in 30 years, and Jarvis Cocker is set to return to the event.
9094c11b42d9eb1b0321f81c4b4f7cb22cbe1352.headline: Olivia Dean and Lola Young Lead 2026 Brit Awards Nominations

ac6693b67742fb3eb07aab858a8d63e736b988f9.summary: Syrian government forces have taken control of the al-Hawl detention camp, where around 24,000 people are held over alleged Islamic State links, following the withdrawal of Kurdish forces. SDF chief Abdi called on the US-led coalition to take responsibility for securing the facility.
ac6693b67742fb3eb07aab858a8d63e736b988f9.headline: Syrian Forces Take Control of al Hawl Camp After Kurdish Withdrawal

878a3a14bd9854c87480121bfbdcfd860c6e8062.summary: Donald Trump stated that Hamas has agreed to give up its weapons and warned that if Hamas does not disarm, it will face severe consequences.
878a3a14bd9854c87480121bfbdcfd860c6e8062.headline: Trump Says Hamas Agreed to Disarm

c71b465a4d696acaad312abebd9eec1935c9287d.summary: Astronomers have found evidence outside our solar system that helps explain the presence of crystalline silicates in comets. These findings suggest that such crystals, which require high temperatures to form, can be transported to cold outer regions, solving a long-standing mystery.
c71b465a4d696acaad312abebd9eec1935c9287d.headline: Astronomers Find Clues to Crystal Formation in Distant Comets

9e4c57fb872cc06c5758e9fe6c1056cda7b3ff4e.summary: Prue Leith has announced she will leave The Great British Bake Off after serving as a judge for nine seasons since 2017. She will step down and her duties will be handed over to someone else.
9e4c57fb872cc06c5758e9fe6c1056cda7b3ff4e.headline: Prue Leith Announces Departure from The Great British Bake Off

0913ff0e7d8b96c4f5e7c0eacdf30c7ed57f31e1.summary: An internal ICE memo obtained by AP reveals that federal immigration officers are asserting authority to enter homes without a judge's warrant. Whistleblower Aid, representing two anonymous U.S. officials, claims this violates the Fourth Amendment and DHS policies. ICE has recently increased enforcement operations in several states, including a new operation in Maine.
0913ff0e7d8b96c4f5e7c0eacdf30c7ed57f31e1.headline: ICE Memo Reveals Warrantless Home Entry Policy Amid Expanded

020a688a5c08f7921dde5a3bca84e30f59464779.summary: Novak Djokovic defeated Francesco Maestrelli in straight sets to reach the third round of the Australian Open, marking his 399th Grand Slam singles match win. Djokovic is now one win away from becoming the first player to achieve 400 Grand Slam singles victories. Madison Keys also advanced to the third round, while Jelena Ostapenko was eliminated.
020a688a5c08f7921dde5a3bca84e30f59464779.headline: Djokovic Nears 400th Grand Slam Win After Advancing at Australian Open

bc2726ed94265139bf99fc770a96478ccfe3252d.summary: Israeli forces killed at least 11 Palestinians in Gaza on Wednesday, including two 13-year-old boys, three journalists, and a woman, according to hospitals. The journalists were operating a drone near Al-Zahra. The incidents are among the deadliest since the ceasefire began three months ago.
bc2726ed94265139bf99fc770a96478ccfe3252d.headline: Israeli Forces Kill 11 Palestinians in Gaza

ee74a1e9f2e4f741da481944ccfc2bc6457aa861.summary: The New York Knicks ended a four-game losing streak with a 120-66 victory over the Brooklyn Nets at Madison Square Garden, setting a new franchise record for largest margin of victory. Jalen Brunson scored 20 points and Landry Shamet added 18, making all six of his 3-point attempts.
ee74a1e9f2e4f741da481944ccfc2bc6457aa861.headline: Knicks Set Franchise Record With 120 66 Win Over Nets

737e580caaaaa0fa20fd890fcd70ddadee7e3d9c.summary: At the World Economic Forum in Davos, President Trump called for immediate talks on acquiring Greenland from Denmark, explicitly ruling out military force or tariffs to do so. EU leaders are set to meet following his remarks. Trump also criticized European leaders and addressed Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney during his speech.
737e580caaaaa0fa20fd890fcd70ddadee7e3d9c.headline: Trump Calls for Talks on Acquiring Greenland

8f53a8358282a260b9128d4d05ffc08de0a9b5fd.summary: The New York Mets acquired All-Star pitcher Freddy Peralta and right-hander Tobias Myers from the Milwaukee Brewers in exchange for prospects Brandon Sproat and Jett Williams. The trade addresses the Mets' need for a top starting pitcher and continues their active offseason roster changes.
8f53a8358282a260b9128d4d05ffc08de0a9b5fd.headline: Mets Acquire Freddy Peralta and Tobias Myers in Trade With Brewers

e8f656188072b050ce9fcebe0259636de502c72d.summary: A Texas jury acquitted former Uvalde school police officer Adrian Gonzales of charges that he failed to confront the gunman during the 2022 Robb Elementary school shooting. This was the first trial related to the law enforcement response to the attack, which resulted in 21 deaths.
e8f656188072b050ce9fcebe0259636de502c72d.headline: Former Uvalde School Police Officer Acquitted in Robb Elementary Trial

a999528b3fad2bfa995092eec141492f893d0b0b.summary: Donald Trump stated he would not use force to acquire Greenland and backed away from proposed tariffs on Europe, leading to a rebound in global stock markets and distancing by some European political groups.
a999528b3fad2bfa995092eec141492f893d0b0b.headline: Trump Backs Away From Greenland and Tariff Threats

1149a018684bdb8b75b78ef74c289467c6022c17.summary: US envoy Steve Witkoff says Ukraine peace talks are down to one issue, with meetings planned between Witkoff, Jared Kushner, and Vladimir Putin on Thursday. Donald Trump and Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelenskiy are also set to meet in Davos as Trump states a Ukraine peace deal is 'reasonably close.'
1149a018684bdb8b75b78ef74c289467c6022c17.headline: US Russia and Ukraine Leaders Set Meetings as Peace Talks Advance

9f7430c51659a2f179e18e1569d747b111d72f82.summary: Three people—a man and two women—were fatally shot in Lake Cargelligo, NSW. Police have urged residents to stay indoors as the suspected gunman remains at large. Authorities are actively searching for the suspect, and the area is under police warning.
9f7430c51659a2f179e18e1569d747b111d72f82.headline: Three Killed in Lake Cargelligo Shooting

533c9a1dfe6987dfb6fc72a74bb3a131a3f8d00e.summary: Hong Kong has begun the national security trial of Chow Hang-tung, Lee Cheuk-yan, and Albert Ho, who are accused of inciting subversion for organizing annual Tiananmen Square massacre vigils. Rights groups have condemned the trial, which started on Thursday.
533c9a1dfe6987dfb6fc72a74bb3a131a3f8d00e.headline: Hong Kong Opens National Security Trial for Tiananmen Vigil Organizers

605b7b1bac2ab38e097a547d19bb4389a6e7ad62.summary: The House Oversight Committee voted to advance resolutions recommending Bill and Hillary Clinton be held in contempt of Congress for not complying with subpoenas related to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. The matter now moves to the full House for consideration.
605b7b1bac2ab38e097a547d19bb4389a6e7ad62.headline: House Panel Advances Contempt Resolutions Against Bill and Hillary

f77b6596d6a60234c57f315ad4bf6f388d47bf91.summary: Mercedes has unveiled the W17, their new Formula 1 car for the 2026 season, aiming to compete at the front of the grid under the sport's updated regulations.
f77b6596d6a60234c57f315ad4bf6f388d47bf91.headline: Mercedes Unveils W17 Formula 1 Car for 2026 Season

42dd90293dd0f13c2ec3e18607ddc1bd818fdc79.summary: Official figures show the UK government borrowed less than expected in December 2025, with a £11.6bn shortfall. Higher tax and National Insurance receipts contributed to the improved public finances, despite increased public sector spending.
42dd90293dd0f13c2ec3e18607ddc1bd818fdc79.headline: UK Government Borrowing Lower Than Expected in December 2025

feac729723380450f3d7f79e0226abcb6bd54bca.summary: Los Angeles Lakers owner Jeanie Buss has addressed reports of tension with LeBron James, including claims she considered trading him to the Clippers and felt he was not appreciative of the team drafting Bronny James in 2024. Buss publicly responded to the reports, defending James and addressing speculation about their relationship.
feac729723380450f3d7f79e0226abcb6bd54bca.headline: Jeanie Buss Addresses Reports of Tension With LeBron James

46bc34fb81f79aa29c4c85047d5d87e06cad7f98.summary: Heavy rains caused flooding and landslides across New Zealand's North Island, resulting in two deaths and several people missing. Rescue teams are searching for survivors as authorities respond to the severe weather damage.
46bc34fb81f79aa29c4c85047d5d87e06cad7f98.headline: Floods and Landslides in New Zealand Leave Two Dead

a07c578c7243b167674b7597e72d67eedc51bed4.summary: San Francisco Giants outfielder Jung Hoo Lee was briefly detained at Los Angeles International Airport on Wednesday due to missing travel documents. The issue was quickly resolved, and Lee was cleared to travel, according to the Giants.
a07c578c7243b167674b7597e72d67eedc51bed4.headline: Giants Jung Hoo Lee Briefly Detained at LAX Over Paperwork Issue

7031d226c837cb81c662078af57f7c11f8b3f94e.summary: The Minnesota Vikings have extended defensive coordinator Brian Flores' contract. Flores will remain with the Vikings for the 2026 season unless he accepts a head coaching job, as he is still a candidate for positions with the Steelers and Ravens.
7031d226c837cb81c662078af57f7c11f8b3f94e.headline: Vikings Extend Brian Flores

5874b7cc8cdcce5e006c5b57a8d2455d4cd1d397.summary: Global markets recovered after the US president withdrew a threat to impose tariffs on European countries related to Greenland. The board initially established for Gaza reconstruction shifted focus to broader global conflict issues.
5874b7cc8cdcce5e006c5b57a8d2455d4cd1d397.headline: Markets Recover as US Drops Tariff Threat Linked to Greenland

717f52454c619cc2d3c871f77b1a9fe511dd95e0.summary: Archaeologists have identified a hand stencil in a limestone cave on Muna Island, Indonesia, as the world's oldest known rock art. The stencil, painted with ochre, is estimated to be at least 67,800 years old.
717f52454c619cc2d3c871f77b1a9fe511dd95e0.headline: Indonesian Cave Hand Stencil Identified as Oldest Known Rock Art

3697826f2872bf8a8d4c18927043b0ae65984a5d.summary: San Francisco 49ers general manager John Lynch said the team is investigating claims that the proximity of their practice facility to an electrical substation may be linked to player injuries, despite the theory being widely debunked.
3697826f2872bf8a8d4c18927043b0ae65984a5d.headline: 49ers Investigate Debunked Substation Injury Link at Practice Facility

218b39690e641e994a15aee6dade3fc423fd4183.summary: The Trump administration has launched an immigration enforcement operation in Maine, citing Governor Janet Mills as a reason for the action. The operation is part of a broader immigration crackdown that also includes attention on Minneapolis.
218b39690e641e994a15aee6dade3fc423fd4183.headline: Trump Administration Launches Immigration Operation in Maine

722ff3c18206ff26457771d937d0bad4c16e4552.summary: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum stated that sending 37 cartel members to the United States was a 'sovereign decision' by her government. The extraditions were carried out at the request of the U.S. Justice Department.
722ff3c18206ff26457771d937d0bad4c16e4552.headline: Mexico Extradites 37 Cartel Members to US at Justice Department

e4426cae505c15ed21abd3617716721526f80a61.summary: Blue Origin has announced plans to launch the first of TeraWave's 5,408 satellites in late 2027, aiming to compete with SpaceX by providing satellite services to businesses and governments. The new network is intended to challenge SpaceX's position in the satellite communications market.
e4426cae505c15ed21abd3617716721526f80a61.headline: Blue Origin Plans TeraWave Satellite Launch to Compete With SpaceX

be4516f7e609760b25b432b6322454ad12f1ee16.summary: Trump announced at Davos that he secured an agreement on the future of Greenland after criticizing Europe and outlining his foreign policy goals.
be4516f7e609760b25b432b6322454ad12f1ee16.headline: Trump Announces Agreement on Greenlands Future at Davos

9512763b01aede55d466bbc03f0330eea425d6d9.summary: An autopsy report released Wednesday ruled the death of a 55-year-old Cuban migrant in solitary confinement at a Texas immigration detention facility as a homicide. Federal authorities had previously described the death as a suicide, but a witness alleged guards pinned and choked the man.

0593f0030a3920761ef7669f4a92293566533e51.summary: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon criticized Donald Trump's proposed credit card interest rate cap, calling it an 'economic disaster,' but suggested testing the policy in Vermont and Massachusetts.
0593f0030a3920761ef7669f4a92293566533e51.headline: Jamie Dimon Criticizes Trumps Credit Card Rate Cap

78fab4e8f479101748bc44a06a929ee470c3cdd0.summary: British Prime Minister Starmer stated that the UK will not yield to pressure from Trump regarding Greenland. NATO's chief confirmed that the topic of Greenland's sovereignty or its status with Denmark was not discussed with Trump.
78fab4e8f479101748bc44a06a929ee470c3cdd0.headline: UK and NATO Say Greenland Sovereignty Not Discussed With Trump

20a9504224f7cf34b8731fef7124ef6ccc02bad4.summary: South Korea's Kospi index surpassed 5,000 for the first time, rising nearly 20% this year. The surge is driven by strong demand for artificial intelligence and market reforms that have attracted investors.
20a9504224f7cf34b8731fef7124ef6ccc02bad4.headline: South Koreas Kospi Index Surpasses 5

81fefbc3a4021c5bc4dd8c67a7b7c6157460bf5d.summary: Donald Trump has filed a $5 billion lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase and CEO Jamie Dimon, alleging that the bank stopped providing him services following the January 6 Capitol riot. The complaint accuses the bank of trade libel and breach of implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing.
81fefbc3a4021c5bc4dd8c67a7b7c6157460bf5d.headline: Trump Sues JPMorgan and CEO Jamie Dimon for $5 Billion Over Debanking

ed317dcc5d8e2a164f9310a76e4893d2f9d53416.summary: France's navy intercepted and boarded the oil tanker Grinch in the Mediterranean on suspicion of violating international sanctions. President Emmanuel Macron stated the vessel was suspected of being part of a Russian 'shadow fleet' attempting to bypass western sanctions. The interception occurred between Spain and Morocco.
ed317dcc5d8e2a164f9310a76e4893d2f9d53416.headline: France Intercepts Suspected Sanctions Busting Russian Oil Tanker

37c9c95dee39820d84a9dbd0728c196a08ffcfb1.summary: President Trump announced at Davos that he and NATO Secretary-General Mark Rutte have agreed on a framework for a future deal regarding Greenland, which may include U.S. mineral rights and sovereignty over military bases. Denmark and Greenland have rejected any transfer of sovereignty, and negotiations are ongoing. Planned U.S. tariffs on European goods have been put on hold.
37c9c95dee39820d84a9dbd0728c196a08ffcfb1.headline: Trump Announces Greenland Deal Framework

b449b2558750e87036bd89441e5cd456bb4f37f0.summary: Ryan Coogler's horror film 'Sinners' received a record 16 Oscar nominations for the 2026 Academy Awards, the most ever for a single film. 'One Battle After Another' followed with 13 nominations. Notable actors including Paul Mescal, George Clooney, and Gwyneth Paltrow were not nominated. 'Sinners' leads the nominations, making Oscars history.
b449b2558750e87036bd89441e5cd456bb4f37f0.headline: Sinners Sets Record With 16 Oscar Nominations for 2026

eb48cb1789b639e0fb0aaa00a6b8c2211071e215.summary: Donald Trump launched the 'Board of Peace' at the World Economic Forum in Davos, aiming to rebuild Gaza and promote disarmament of Hamas. The board's initial membership remains unclear, with many top US allies, including European nations and Britain, declining to join. The initiative has drawn criticism for its resemblance to the UN and for limited international participation.
eb48cb1789b639e0fb0aaa00a6b8c2211071e215.headline: Trump Launches Board of Peace at Davos With Limited Allied Support

d480cc8a77e3e5f3f0b4a2064fd6eee8fdab2ac2.summary: The Tampa Bay Buccaneers are hiring Zac Robinson as their offensive coordinator. Robinson previously served as the Atlanta Falcons' offensive coordinator for the past two seasons and was previously their pass game coordinator and quarterbacks coach.
d480cc8a77e3e5f3f0b4a2064fd6eee8fdab2ac2.headline: Buccaneers Hire Zac Robinson as Offensive Coordinator

e387b98eacdc450e0fb9c0235e3e79c42da6920b.summary: Christian McCaffrey is a finalist for three AP NFL awards in the same year, including the 2025 NFL Most Valuable Player, Offensive Player of the Year, and Comeback Player of the Year. Other MVP finalists are Josh Allen, Trevor Lawrence, Drake Maye, and Matthew Stafford. Winners will be announced at NFL Honors on February 5.
e387b98eacdc450e0fb9c0235e3e79c42da6920b.headline: McCaffrey Named Finalist for Three AP NFL Awards

211d38b062e42841a1e828ab4b433bec145a6008.summary: Jack Smith testified before the House Judiciary Committee, stating he found proof beyond a reasonable doubt that President Trump engaged in criminal activity. Smith defended his decision to charge Trump in Florida and Washington, D.C., and criticized false narratives about his investigation. The cases did not go to trial.
211d38b062e42841a1e828ab4b433bec145a6008.headline: Jack Smith Defends Charging Trump

b21c96d0ace42522221e8bc1701b8b2413bc9fc7.summary: Attorney General Pam Bondi announced the arrest of Nekima Levy Armstrong and at least one other person following a protest at Cities Church in St. Paul, where a local U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement official is a pastor.
b21c96d0ace42522221e8bc1701b8b2413bc9fc7.headline: Two Arrested After Protest at St. Paul Church Involving ICE Official

43fd9a8ed51b78e35a38650f2a1aec43df2d12e3.summary: Gold prices fell and Asian stocks rose after Donald Trump announced a deal with NATO that he says gives the US 'total access' to Greenland for mining and military purposes. Greenland's prime minister responded that the island's sovereignty is non-negotiable, demanding respect for its red lines. European allies are reacting to Trump's reversal on US tariffs and Greenland policy.

cbac04cc9c2327f69ed5ac216d92b30727515d76.summary: The NBA and Abu Dhabi's Department of Culture and Tourism have extended their partnership, agreeing to continue holding NBA preseason games in the Middle East and finalizing plans to launch a new global basketball academy in Abu Dhabi.

ICE stated it was not targeting the boy. The individuals were transported to a detention center in Texas. Tensions have risen in the area following the detentions.

Tucker chose the Dodgers over offers from the Mets and Blue Jays, citing the team's championship pedigree. He was introduced by the Dodgers on Wednesday as part of their efforts to strengthen outfield production for the upcoming season.

7ce3aaa9c6eb52af0f0e2cb1fdf3ec45ff3c921c.summary: Jack Smith told the House Judiciary Committee that Donald Trump broke the law during the 2020 election effort but said he did not charge Trump with insurrection. Smith testified about his investigations as the committee held a hearing.
7ce3aaa9c6eb52af0f0e2cb1fdf3ec45ff3c921c.headline: Jack Smith Testifies Trump Broke Law but Was Not Charged With

fa1abe59b0fcc1a7f4bab29f62d32b22e7cc164d.headline: Naomi Osaka Apologizes After Tense Handshake With Sorana Cirstea

bbd6b5d7be27d5e85832e54dff371951c67b2a69.summary: SpaceX has selected Bank of America, Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan Chase, and Morgan Stanley to lead its planned initial public offering, according to reports on January 22, 2026.

9b8d554dec99c5e51a1b072dbdc5a803e1e08c2d.headline: Antetokounmpo Criticizes Bucks Teammates After Loss to Thunder

72a16b2f077d2403fe9020ddd5e60cf193a28790.summary: A Texas jury has acquitted a former Uvalde school police officer of charges related to his response during the 2022 Robb Elementary school shooting, where 19 students and two adults were killed.

10085420b5b56334cdc09de50c0c045e6a73b42e.summary: Manchester United have confirmed that midfielder Casemiro will leave the club when his contract expires at the end of the current season, as the club has decided not to trigger a one-year extension.

Andy Burnham may seek to stand for the seat, though the Prime Minister has declined to comment on whether he supports Burnham's potential candidacy.

4f665beae4bc960fe03e860de505dc5ae6c9e887.summary: After talks with Trump, Zelenskiy stated that the issue of territorial disputes remains unresolved.

26e0717191e684fabeef35c0d2ae25fff396eb44.summary: Donald Trump has filed a $5 billion lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase and CEO Jamie Dimon, alleging that the bank engaged in 'debanking' for political reasons. The suit marks an escalation in ongoing disputes between Trump and JPMorgan Chase.

Minter replaces John Harbaugh and becomes the fourth head coach in the franchise's history.

The agreement includes measures for data privacy and cybersecurity, addressing national security concerns raised by U.S. officials.

Anton Lundell and Sam Reinhart scored in the shootout, while Sam Bennett scored in regulation for Florida. Daniil Tarasov made 17 saves for the Panthers, who have won four of their last six games. Cole Perfetti scored the only goal for Winnipeg.

3c84d7c5b5a40bb851cd60de924c303e9fd9b781.summary: Rescue teams in New Zealand continue searching for at least six missing people after landslides struck a house and campground, resulting in two deaths. Officials warn the search may take several days, with no progress reported overnight.

a6d7220aeed8a5975724dcc93f28de004cc074ef.summary: Amazon is set to cut thousands more corporate jobs next week, according to reports. The planned layoffs follow a previous round of job reductions in October.

The injury, announced by the team on Saturday, will keep Morant sidelined through the February 5 trade deadline.
c0a4b7629a55b4391a67608d83ef0a21469a1642.headline: Grizzlies Ja Morant Out at Least Three Weeks With Elbow Sprain

04a20f3a6e8f1f9c6ad2048a435f9bb87c86ac60.summary: Nearly 12,000 flights have been canceled across the US as a major winter storm brings heavy snow, ice, and dangerous conditions to more than a dozen states. Airlines have issued travel waivers and advised passengers on refunds and rebooking. States have declared emergencies or urged residents to stay home as the storm moves from east Texas to North Carolina.
04a20f3a6e8f1f9c6ad2048a435f9bb87c86ac60.headline: Major Winter Storm Cancels Nearly 12

89b362ee9e265897639e560dc990ec7373608907.summary: A major winter storm is affecting over 180 million people across the US, causing grid emergencies, widespread power outages, hazardous road conditions, and flight cancellations. Emergency declarations have been issued as heavy snow and ice impact areas from the southern Rocky Mountains to New England, including New York and Boston.
89b362ee9e265897639e560dc990ec7373608907.headline: Severe Winter Storm Triggers Grid Emergencies and Travel Disruptions

10d69ae12026d74baaa643967b7e5b7c20531d03.summary: Gen. Zhang Youxia has been removed from his position in China's military leadership, and Liu Zhenli is under investigation. Analysts say these actions are part of a broader effort to reform the military and strengthen loyalty to Xi Jinping.
10d69ae12026d74baaa643967b7e5b7c20531d03.headline: Gen. Zhang Youxia Removed as China Probes Top Military Officials

725940d2237b49516651c0a66fcb2318e0add0ef.summary: Green Bay Packers offensive lineman Rasheed Walker was arrested at New York's LaGuardia Airport and charged with two counts of second-degree criminal possession of a weapon and criminal possession of a firearm after attempting to check in a bag containing a firearm. Walker's attorney stated the firearm was legally licensed in Wisconsin and called the incident a misunderstanding.
725940d2237b49516651c0a66fcb2318e0add0ef.headline: Packers Rasheed Walker Arrested at LaGuardia Airport on Firearm

d4e68653314a7aa6c5e2302d9b7905eef9353480.summary: Syrian diplomatic sources say the Syrian government and Kurdish forces have agreed to extend their ceasefire for one month to allow the transfer of suspected Islamic State members from Syria to Iraq. However, Syria's foreign ministry denies that an agreement to extend the deadline has been reached, leaving the status of the ceasefire uncertain.
d4e68653314a7aa6c5e2302d9b7905eef9353480.headline: Status of Syria Kurdish Ceasefire Extension Remains Unclear

211a6f5fdcdce0959f0a867f12aeb02473c36e55.summary: Giannis Antetokounmpo left Friday's game against the Denver Nuggets with a right calf injury and will undergo an MRI on Saturday. He stated he expects to be sidelined for at least four to six weeks. This follows a previous calf injury that caused him to miss eight games earlier in the season.
211a6f5fdcdce0959f0a867f12aeb02473c36e55.headline: Giannis Antetokounmpo Expects Four to Six Weeks Out With Calf Injury

7c1f06a1c11bef3da2fea0b41b2a0a7d91f740b1.summary: Justin Gaethje and Paddy Pimblett are set to compete for the interim UFC lightweight title in Las Vegas at UFC 324. The event marks the UFC's debut on Paramount+, with the title fight headlining the card on Saturday.
7c1f06a1c11bef3da2fea0b41b2a0a7d91f740b1.headline: Gaethje and Pimblett Meet for Interim UFC Lightweight Title at UFC 324

03313ff83da3605b844b6136f7197faa9fe9ddc5.summary: Russia launched a large-scale drone and missile attack on Kyiv and Kharkiv during ongoing talks with the US and Ukraine in the UAE. Ukrainian officials report 396 drones and missiles were used. The talks ended without a breakthrough, and Russian attacks continue.
03313ff83da3605b844b6136f7197faa9fe9ddc5.headline: Russia Strikes Kyiv and Kharkiv as UAE Talks End Without Breakthrough

7a8dcab2969bb8e69fa55e24ab02d335e7815229.summary: Kansas freshman Darryn Peterson will miss Saturday's game against Kansas State due to an ankle injury. Coach Bill Self will return to coach the team for the Sunflower Showdown.
7a8dcab2969bb8e69fa55e24ab02d335e7815229.headline: Kansas Darryn Peterson Out vs. Kansas State With Ankle Injury

2f63ea08244e1549febf67e5b78e3ff27472246e.summary: Cristian Romero scored a 90th-minute equalizer to secure a 2-2 draw for Tottenham Hotspur against Burnley. The result leaves Tottenham with only two wins in their last 14 Premier League matches, increasing pressure on head coach Thomas Frank amid calls for his dismissal from supporters.
2f63ea08244e1549febf67e5b78e3ff27472246e.headline: Romeros Late Goal Secures Draw for Tottenham

b49f86ecac906bf8ed882e57065dab6dde807fab.summary: US-brokered peace talks in Abu Dhabi ended without an agreement after Russian air strikes targeted Ukraine overnight.
b49f86ecac906bf8ed882e57065dab6dde807fab.headline: US Brokered Ukraine Peace Talks End With No Deal After Russian Strikes

4ac06e2417023a991d2b6f5007401a61f152a943.summary: Leon Draisaitl has used his time away from the Edmonton Oilers to reflect on his priorities and what is most important to him.
4ac06e2417023a991d2b6f5007401a61f152a943.headline: Leon Draisaitl Reflects on Priorities During Time Away from Oilers

df6f68b8fc90c1811fcec999cf9556868fcb65da.summary: England defeated Sri Lanka by five wickets in the second one-day international in Colombo, chasing down 219 with Joe Root scoring 75. The win levels the three-match ODI series at 1-1, setting up a decider.
df6f68b8fc90c1811fcec999cf9556868fcb65da.headline: England Beat Sri Lanka to Level ODI Series Ahead of Decider

6236cae1dfd7493062042ccd5284ebd10a7d558e.summary: The US is in discussions with Chevron, other oil producers, and major oilfield service companies to rapidly increase Venezuela's oil output through targeted repairs, aiming to boost production without the full $100 billion needed for a complete overhaul.
6236cae1dfd7493062042ccd5284ebd10a7d558e.headline: US Seeks Rapid Repairs to Increase Venezuela Oil Production

aaf739be22cd19bf299311b86e95752f395c5127.summary: Bournemouth defeated Liverpool 3-2 with a stoppage-time goal by Amine Adli, ending Liverpool's 13-game unbeaten run. Liverpool are now winless in their last five league matches.
aaf739be22cd19bf299311b86e95752f395c5127.headline: Bournemouth End Liverpools 13 Game Unbeaten Run With 3 2 Win

6c553df0bb0798367ca7c71e5ef03530bc46b7fc.summary: The Greater Manchester mayor has announced plans to run in the Gorton and Denton by-election, stating his intention to support the Labour government rather than challenge it.
6c553df0bb0798367ca7c71e5ef03530bc46b7fc.headline: Greater Manchester Mayor to Run in Gorton and Denton By Election

c08585d4e006809063885b5a06669931c77db218.summary: A gas explosion and fire on the top floors of a New York City apartment building killed one person and injured 14 others on January 24, 2026.
c08585d4e006809063885b5a06669931c77db218.headline: New York City Apartment Explosion Kills 1

5dd4bcb856cef6e0979769cd06cc7a95aeee9686.summary: Donald Trump announced that a US naval force is being sent to the Middle East and stated that the United States is closely monitoring Iran. He also claimed his threats have stopped executions in Iran, as reports continue of a crackdown on protests.
5dd4bcb856cef6e0979769cd06cc7a95aeee9686.headline: Trump Sends US Naval Force to Middle East

c13a84536f47c64af7c7a49adbf1fd5c9544a14a.summary: The Pentagon released a new National Defense Strategy prioritizing U.S. dominance in the Western Hemisphere and urging allies to take greater responsibility for their own security, moving away from a focus on countering China.
c13a84536f47c64af7c7a49adbf1fd5c9544a14a.headline: Pentagon Unveils Strategy Urging Allies to Boost Their Own Security

2d7bc9a42a283f43a802880bc842e5a12620c7ec.summary: US special envoys are in Israel to discuss the future of Gaza, according to sources cited by Reuters and Al Arabiya English. The talks focus on the situation in Gaza and possible next steps.
2d7bc9a42a283f43a802880bc842e5a12620c7ec.headline: US Envoys in Israel for Talks on Gazas Future

f70c3be32a5449f4a24d79014f6bd345290cfd74.summary: Donald Trump stated that the US has taken oil from Venezuelan tankers that were seized. This information was reported in interviews with major news outlets.
f70c3be32a5449f4a24d79014f6bd345290cfd74.headline: Trump Says US Took Oil From Seized Venezuelan Tankers

6e74f42d4b556bf89d122f89c5c213f9170bc588.summary: New Zealand police have ended rescue efforts after a landslide and begun a recovery operation, stating it is unlikely any of the missing individuals are still alive. Authorities are working to identify the victims.
6e74f42d4b556bf89d122f89c5c213f9170bc588.headline: New Zealand Shifts to Recovery After Landslide

5d8757dffb284603972af8f7a7248f0dcd3aa026.summary: Nico Antic died in a hospital after being bitten by a shark in Sydney Harbour, marking the first of several recent shark attacks along Australia's southeastern coast. Australia averages about 20 shark attacks annually, with fewer than three resulting in fatalities.
5d8757dffb284603972af8f7a7248f0dcd3aa026.headline: Nico Antic Dies After Shark Attack in Sydney Harbour

b34ae8ab5dfd0494cfb855e3273b9dd5871d8568.summary: A 37-year-old Minneapolis man was fatally shot by a federal agent outside a donut shop. Video from Saturday shows federal agents wrestling the man to the ground before gunfire occurred. Police confirmed the man's death.
b34ae8ab5dfd0494cfb855e3273b9dd5871d8568.headline: Minneapolis Man Killed by Federal Agent Outside Donut Shop

d2c1885d547427cf593a22b8258bd3bca4c4f758.summary: Donald Trump praised the UK's military after Prime Minister Keir Starmer called on him to apologize for minimizing NATO troops' role in the Afghanistan war.
d2c1885d547427cf593a22b8258bd3bca4c4f758.headline: Trump Praises UK Troops After Starmer Requests Apology Over NATO

3cbbafcc6d883f0da236179d94be2d0d857aa5d9.summary: The Pittsburgh Steelers have reached a verbal agreement with Mike McCarthy to become their next head coach, replacing Mike Tomlin after 19 years. McCarthy, a Pittsburgh native and former Cowboys and Packers coach, is set to lead the team following the official announcement on Saturday.
3cbbafcc6d883f0da236179d94be2d0d857aa5d9.headline: Steelers Reach Verbal Agreement With Mike McCarthy as Head Coach

0462ee471b867707085b04ae33199399d1bd9bdd.summary: American climber Alex Honnold scaled the 1,667-foot Taipei 101 skyscraper in Taiwan without ropes or protective equipment, becoming the first person to do so. The climb was broadcast live after a rain delay and drew crowds and international attention.
0462ee471b867707085b04ae33199399d1bd9bdd.headline: Alex Honnold Becomes First to Climb Taipei 101 Without Ropes

93c38caa5293c166df328585be9fafead7ee501c.summary: Justin Gaethje defeated Paddy Pimblett by unanimous decision at UFC 324 in Las Vegas to win the interim lightweight title. Gaethje scored multiple knockdowns, ending Pimblett's nine-fight winning streak. The victory sets up a potential title unification bout for Gaethje.
93c38caa5293c166df328585be9fafead7ee501c.headline: Justin Gaethje Wins UFC Interim Lightweight Title Over Paddy Pimblett

ce3c0e4aff99a7c591f324d58e1fdcb9e5fa2cf9.summary: Donald Trump has threatened to impose a 100% tariff on all Canadian imports if Canada makes a trade deal with China. The warning follows Mark Carney's speech at Davos, which criticized the state of the U.S.-led world order. There is currently no indication that Canada and China are negotiating a broad trade agreement.
ce3c0e4aff99a7c591f324d58e1fdcb9e5fa2cf9.headline: Trump Threatens 100% Tariff on Canada Over Potential China Trade Deal

41d8a89dc1b5a93727dde37e810a26828e57bdf3.summary: Luka Doncic scored 33 points with 8 rebounds and 11 assists as the Los Angeles Lakers overcame a 15-point deficit in the final seven minutes to defeat the Dallas Mavericks 116-110 on Saturday night. The game marked Doncic's second visit to Dallas since his trade to the Lakers nearly a year ago.
41d8a89dc1b5a93727dde37e810a26828e57bdf3.headline: Doncic Leads Lakers to 116 110 Comeback Win Over Mavericks in Dallas

b0a3b12a38a59b99d41e51df594b80f4a0b8b948.summary: Syria's government and Kurdish-led SDF have extended their ceasefire by 15 days to facilitate the transfer of suspected Islamic State members from facilities previously held by the SDF. The agreement temporarily averts renewed conflict between the two sides.
b0a3b12a38a59b99d41e51df594b80f4a0b8b948.headline: Syria and Kurdish Forces Extend Ceasefire for 15 Days

0ae1f720deed84fa8c463d4dfd887a9f280c92f8.summary: Evan Bouchard scored his first NHL hat trick and added three assists for a six-point game as the Edmonton Oilers defeated the Washington Capitals 6-5 in overtime. Connor McDavid scored the overtime winner and finished with five points. The Oilers' win was among several NHL games Saturday, including victories for the Blue Jackets, Mammoth, Hurricanes, Red Wings, Sabres, Kings, Bruins, and Panthers.
0ae1f720deed84fa8c463d4dfd887a9f280c92f8.headline: Bouchards Six Point Night Leads Oilers to 6 5 Overtime Win Over

4cb0cc370b20816b1e446732126aafe88f9a54b4.summary: Federal agents fatally shot 37-year-old ICU nurse Alex Pretti during a raid in Minneapolis, sparking protests. Videos and witness statements indicate Pretti was holding a phone, not a weapon. The incident, the second fatal shooting by federal officers in Minneapolis within a month, led to the postponement of a major basketball game and widespread demonstrations.
4cb0cc370b20816b1e446732126aafe88f9a54b4.headline: Federal Agents Fatally Shoot ICU Nurse in Minneapolis

2cf2ac718e05aa01e688d32684911a297c63e906.summary: A massive winter storm affecting two-thirds of the U.S. has led to the cancellation of over 13,000 flights, with airlines issuing travel waivers and advising passengers on refunds and rebooking. More than 180 million people are under weather alerts as the storm brings dangerous ice and snow from New Mexico to Maine.
2cf2ac718e05aa01e688d32684911a297c63e906.headline: Over 13000 Flights Canceled as Major Winter Storm Hits U.S

9991bbec3178c5069a38bc5406fab9da3edbe895.summary: The Chicago Bulls retired Derrick Rose's No. 1 jersey in an emotional ceremony following their 114-111 win over the Boston Celtics on Saturday night. Rose joined a select group of Bulls players whose numbers have been retired by the team.
9991bbec3178c5069a38bc5406fab9da3edbe895.headline: Chicago Bulls Retire Derrick Roses No. 1 Jersey After Win Over Celtics

5439a278f5793dc2c4b6646b73f29ac94828738e.summary: Memphis Grizzlies star guard Ja Morant will be out for approximately three weeks with a UCL sprain in his left elbow, keeping him sidelined through the February 5 trade deadline.
5439a278f5793dc2c4b6646b73f29ac94828738e.headline: Ja Morant Out Three Weeks With Elbow Injury

92e20488b3082a7c884739af016b9154b7146b09.summary: The lightweight fight between Alexander Hernandez and Michael Johnson at UFC 324 was canceled hours before the event due to suspicious betting activity, according to UFC CEO Dana White.
92e20488b3082a7c884739af016b9154b7146b09.headline: UFC 324 Fight Canceled Over Suspicious Betting Activity

afacf7a4370bbc96e73fb7ecb703f795647bb0a6.summary: Si Woo Kim leads the American Express golf tournament by one shot after the third round, with Scottie Scheffler and 18-year-old Blades Brown tied for second place.
afacf7a4370bbc96e73fb7ecb703f795647bb0a6.headline: Si Woo Kim Leads American Express After Three Rounds

966a07983746416ef494e951ad83bb8082c1defd.summary: Aryna Sabalenka defeated Victoria Mboko in the fourth round of the Australian Open, advancing to the tournament's quarterfinals. Mboko's singles run ended with the loss in Melbourne.
966a07983746416ef494e951ad83bb8082c1defd.headline: Sabalenka Advances to Australian Open Quarterfinals Over Mboko

e1625b7927722b230f8056fc85b2668d6b9807cc.summary: The mayor of Greater Manchester is seeking to stand in the Gorton and Denton by-election, but allies of the prime minister may attempt to block this move.
